name: September 12th: A Toy World
summary:
September 12th is a serious game with a political statement about the USA's War on Terror which started after September 11th 2001.

In the game, the player is presented with a Middle Eastern market place in a top-down isometric view. Walking around the market and the surrounding buildings are innocent civilians - men, women, children, and dogs. There also several terrorist walking among them.

All the player can do is scroll the camera and fire missiles. Missiles will impact on the exact location of the targeting reticule, but with a small delay. Killing a terrorist will remove the terrorist from play. If another civilian encounters his or her body, the civilian will burst into an emotional display and become determined to go on a jihad and thus also become a terrorist. The more civilians you kill the more terrorists come into play.

Buildings also get destroyed when hit by the rather large blast radius of the player's missiles. Civilians surrounding collapsing buildings also die. After a long period of waiting buildings will also slowly be reconstructed again. Terrorists will after a while cool down and become normal civilians again, but a small number of terrorists will always remain terrorists.

name: Seul Alone: The Entrée - Cyoa
summary:
Seul Alone is a philosophical thriller, containing horror elements. A subsistence where characters dwell. It is a choose your own adventure type of game but there are mysteries to solve and connections to unfold. Journey through here but remember you may not stay.

Looking deeper at Seul.(Alone) it is a philosophical thriller, meaning it is a thriller based on thrilling philosophical ideas and contains horror elements. From nihilism, existentialism, surrealism, solipsism and absurdism. A narrative told with these ideas kept in mind. I wanted to play on these thoughts but also present some Lynchian kind of world where nothing makes much sense at first glance but as one adapts to it, when it manages to invade itself into you. You begin to see that mostly everything is staged within the game for a reason, a motivation sits behind every image and sentence.

Seul.(Alone) is aimed to be a detective styled game where every choice has weight and you can feel that but I also wanted it to be about nothing. Like how dreams can feel at times. It seems so heavy and important to the dreamer while the dream is happening but when one wakes it seems to lose all its importance or even its sensibility. The weight of it has dissipated and you are left with this odd out of place feeling while you lay there replaying the memory of the dream you just had.

But at times those dreams can still affect you if you lay there and really begin to pull them apart and ask why, what was the reason for that? Where did those thoughts come from? What is my subconscious communicating, where are the links to my life? Now you are studying the dream… and there’s a whole ocean of stuff behind that now, connections, motivations and meanings. This is what I want to achieve in Seul.(Alone) and you mostly ever find yourself studying those areas of your life when you are truly Seul.(Alone).

name: Secret Agent Game: The 5 Keys
summary: Secret Agent Game: The 5 Keys is a point and click adventure game unlike anything you have ever played before. Why? Because of this simple concept. “Why do so many game developers try to make computer games look like ‘real life’ when you can make ‘real life’ play like a computer game? “ The result is a masterpiece that has the charm of the classic point and click adventure games with the realism of being in a movie. It's Interactive video but it's taken to a whole new exciting level of interactions. CG Entertainment brings together skillsets from movie making, 3d animation and coding to create an immersive interactive world.

Questioning the veracity of blurred memories and hallucinations, and discovering the lies within himself. Stunning graphics, intense action and masterful storytelling. Experience the madness.

summary: Second to Nun is a top-down budget-friendly pixel-art retro top-down fighting classic game. Beat your way to the top and become the top nun through the gruelling challenges on the Island of Trials and Tribulations!

name: Sex Girlfriend Simulator
summary: Have you ever thought about being the perfect girlfriend? Now your dreams will come true!

name: Serendipity Hotel
summary: The detective is invited to the Serendipity Hotel. What will the detective experience in the hotel? Become a detective and participate in the Serendipity Hotel event

name: See You In Desolation?
summary: "See You In Desolation?" is a psychological, single-player, first-person horror game. You have to take on the role of Adam - an introverted young man who prefers to be at home all days.

name: Selenwald
summary: Selenwald is an action roguelike RPG that combines dynamic and challenging combat with strategy and resource management. Take control of random adventurers to fight and sneak your way through eldritch horrors roaming the ever changing halls of the Selenwald university.

name: Search All: Crabs
summary: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the crabs in a large location. Crabs will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Search All: Cats
summary: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the cats in a large location. Seals will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Search All: Potions
summary: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the cones / vessels with potions on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling". The location depicts a medieval extraordinary city

name: Search All: Seashells
summary: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the seashells on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling"

name: Search All: Foxes
summary: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the foxes on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling". The location shows a Chinese city

name: Search All: Animals
summary: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the animals in a large location drawn in the style of "doodling". There is a medieval castle on the game location, and in front of the castle there is a watermill with a pond

name: Serious Breakdown
summary: Serious Breakdown is a platformer, in the role of a robot, you need to clean up the levels as much as possible and get the necessary parts. Learn to dodge or kill enemies. At the end of the path, you will need to defeat the main villain of this universe.

name: Sega Mega Drive and Genesis Classics
summary: Sega's collection of Mega Drive & Genesis Classics comes to a new generation, now updated with even more features: online multiplayer, achievements, mirror mode, rewind, save states, VR and more! Over 50 classic games in one great package. Get into the classics!

name: Serial Hunter
summary: Serial Hunter, an action-adventure thriller, invites you into the twisted mind of the self-proclaimed avenger. Play as John Doe, an investigative journalist who uses information gathered at work to rid the public of the most degenerate individuals. And the cleansing methods are very diverse... As an investigative journalist, you have access to many tools that allow you to track down the incarnate evil. Use police frequency monitoring, whistleblower services and connection to municipal surveillance to establish the identity and whereabouts of your target. Only then will you plan a perfect execution.

name: Semantle
summary: A daily word-guessing game where each guess must be a word (of any length) or short phrase. The game will tell you how semantically similar it thinks your word is to the secret word. Unlike that other word game, it's not about the spelling; it's about the meaning.

name: Seraph's Last Stand
summary: Create insane builds and break the game in all possible ways to get your name into the leaderboards! Seraph's Last Stand is an indie action shooter game where every round you get stronger, but so does the enemies...

name: Search of Galaxy
summary: After the supernova explosion, the Thermian race was destroyed. All knowledge, technologies and data about the past were lost. You must to restore civilization and explore the territories of your home system in search of lost technologies and artifacts.

name: Sel Quinta: The Six City Quest
summary: A single player RPG about directing a six man party in their travels across a fantasy island in their efforts to save the world from an impending invasion!

name: Second World
summary: In Second World, you have to take on the role of a little demon who needs to get out of the lost world and return home. On a way you will meet a lot of deadly traps and monsters that will do anything for you to stay in this strange and at the same time frightening world.

name: Seven Pirates H
summary: Seven Pirates H is a traditional RPG focused on exploration and discovery with a gigantic dose of fanservice thrown in! As Parute, you'll command your party of monster girls in combat against naughty enemies, exploiting weaknesses to gain the upper hand in turn-based combat. Adventure across islands in 3D and ride Otton to reach secret areas, gather items and enhance your abilities as you level up! With the special "Booby Training" system, you can control the bust size of the all-female crew for stat boosts, bigger for increased power and defense or smaller for improved speed and agility!

name: Search All: Cactuses
summary: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the cacti in a large location. Cacti will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Search All: Mushrooms
summary: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the mushrooms in a large location. Mushrooms will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Search All: Spiders
summary: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the spiders in a large location. Spiders will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Search All: Berries
summary: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the berries in a large location. The berries will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Search All: Runes
summary: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the ancient runes on a large location. Ancient runes will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places.

name: Secret Kiss is Sweet and Tender
summary: Look at me when you kiss me.

name: Set Sail
summary: Set Sail is a western visual novel set in the modern day where the Golden Age of Pirating never properly ended. You get to meet characters interested in the world of piracy and choose how your days on the main land go.

name: Secret Pie
summary: Secret story between the mansion manager and three women

name: Seedlings
summary: Immerse yourself in nature as a sentient seed in this relaxing award-winning 2.5D puzzle platformer. Possess different plant creatures with unique abilities and find your way through the New Zealand native forest, made using real photos and videos.

name: Sengoku Dynasty
summary: Sengoku Dynasty is the ultimate feudal Japan experience: build villages, grow your community, and shape the open world through combat or economy. The choice is yours alone - or that of up to 4 players in multiplayer co-op!

name: Sea Battle Minimal
summary: Classic strategy game - conquer leaderboard, challenge your friends and AI!

name: Sea Dogs
summary: 1654 AC. The Caribbean. Take a role of a young French noble who arrived at the New World to assist his brother. What seemed to be a simple family matter, turned into a lifelong adventure! Fierce battles, deadly adversaries, heartwarming friendship, beautiful romance, and A LOT of treasures.

name: Secrets of the Temple
summary: Secrets of the Temple is a single player puzzle platformer adventure game. Traverse the Pharaoh's labyrinthian temple and locate and collect the Eye of Ra before it's too late!

name: Sex Diary: A Slutty Anniversary
summary: An explicit Click-Through VISUAL NOVEL about a newlywed couple sharing a very special first anniversary gift – her ex-girlfriend, Mindy.

name: Secret Oops!
summary: Secret Oops! is an innovative cooperative local multiplayer Augmented Reality game where players try to make sure that the world's dumbest spy isn't detected.

name: Seethe and Scab
summary: Seethe and Scab is a found-footage horror game about the scars we leave on land, and how they heal. Explore a local defense factory as an urban exploration youtuber. A 15 minute horror experience.

name: Seishun Fragile
summary:
Shiki Yuuto is normal student living with his imouto-like maid Toune in a big Europe residence built by his ancestors from long time ago. However, he hides a big secret from everyone. He is actually descendant of branch family from a lineage of high class wizards which moved to Japan hundred years ago. Despite being a shabby wizard, he used to help people with magic while chasing the "Bad Wizard" as duty given to head of clan, but now he is just lazy around and doesn't care much about magic anymore.

One day, while he is cleaning the old church behind his house, a mystery blonde wizard suddenly crashes into the church and is helped by his classmate Setsuna who "happens to be there by chance". The wizard introduces herself as Riz Mathers and claims to be his relative from the head family in British who comes to be his master. This fateful encounter between the three of them will unfold a bitter sweet story about their youth.

name: Seeds of Calamity
summary: Take part in healing after the Great Calamity. Tend your farm, complete quests for the villagers, and explore dungeons filled with challenge and treasure in this cozy, solo-developed farming sim. Build a new life in a recovering world with your fluffy Spellbook Companion.

name: Seal of Sins
summary: "Seal of Sins" is a independent horizontal action game. It is based on ancient fantasy myths. The mysterious messenger wakes you up according to the agreement, and you have embarked on an unknown journey since then. In a world with a strong ancient and wild atmosphere, you will experience many hardships, compose tragic epics in tense and exciting battles, integrate puzzle-solving elements, and face the dual challenges of strategy and operation!

name: Sewer Run
summary: A Shockwave player game about skateboarding through sewers and jumping off ramps while picking up super powers to hinder fellow skateboarders.

name: Serial Woman
summary: A Surreal Puzzle game with light horror elements and a PS1-style aesthetic.

name: Sedecordle
summary: A daily word guessing game, where players have 21 tries to guess 16 mystery words. Each word guessed reveals a clue about the hidden words based on the letters in the guess, and their positions. Also includes a free-play mode.

name: Seventh Lair
summary: From Novectacle, the creators of the highly acclaimed The House in Fata Morgana, comes Seventh Lair, a tongue-in-cheek, but emotional look at the online interactions between an indie game developer and fans!

name: Seal of Evil
summary: Seal of Evil is a mythical take on the tumultuous time marking the fall of the Zhou imperial dynasty. Out of this chaos emerges an uncompromising ruler, Ying Zheng, who has vowed to either unify China or bury it in fire.

name: Secrets of Magic 5: Back to School
summary: Victoria and Beatrix are back at the School of Magic just in time to celebrate the best time of the year, Halloween!

name: Sea of Dreams
summary:
You wake up alone aboard the boat named the Sea of Dream. Strange things happen. Baggage everywhere, traces of blood. But no one. You are alone. Your goal is simple, find help. For this, you will have to explore the ship and solve puzzles in order to move forward. And maybe understand what happened.

Will you survive the Sea of Dreams? Find a way to escape from this dream that has turned into a nightmare.

name: Seaside Driving
summary: Chill & drive 80's style. Get into your car and cruise endlessly while listening to synthwave tracks.

name: Sexy Exile
summary: Sexy Exile is a fast paced action dating sim with puzzle and arcade elements which provides players with an exciting XXX mode, adventurous dates, and captivating stories. Venture out into the world to meet cute girls and make them part of your collection – always ready for some naughty fun!

name: Selobus Fantasy
summary: One day, an letter arrives to a novice adventurer named "Yunivers". The letter said that it was searching for an adventurer to explore the ruins at a remote island named "Cruijff Island". Now starts their journey.

name: Seashell
summary: Relax, make time for yourself and collect unique and beautiful gifts from the sea. Examine seashells while learning all about them in this short, experimental game about our favourite place to unwind.

name: Severance
summary: Years after the Overflow, a catastrophe that plunged the city of Sci-Two into a decaying metropolis, a wayward smuggler stumbles into a plot surrounding the miracle drug Halcyon, veteran soldiers, and the corporation out to eradicate anyone too close to the truth, in a classic JRPG experience.

name: Secret Agent Spy Game: Hotel Assassination Mission
SeaWolf VR
summary: Dive into the deep virtual waters and become a SeaWolf. Shoot your missiles and torpedoes at hostile submarines, minesweepers and tankers, actively avoid depth charges and enemy torpedoes, use defensive shield while trying to protect sea animals.

name: Seeds of Unity
summary: A unique story-driven farming RPG that also has aspects of sci-fi, romance, and exploration embedded within. Create lasting friendships, help the newly found colony thrive, investigate the unexplored surface, and perhaps even find that special someone along the way.

name: Sex Adventures: The Spa
summary: A visual novel about a young woman's naughty adventures at her favorite SPA.

name: Sex Adventures: Futanari BDSM
summary: A click-through visual novel about a lesbian couple who goes to a secret BDSM club. They must be prepared for whatever the dominatrix tells them to do.

name: Sentry City
summary: Sentry City is a cyberpunk-style side-scroller with gameplay that is part trial-and-error, and part reaction time based. Traverse the city using the motorcycle overworld map, blast and think your way through the levels, and fight tough bosses to uncover who is behind the city's AI disruption.

name: Sea of Choices
summary: With both immersive and life sim elements, plot out your day to day life in the shoes of Aura! In combat use turn-based tactics to employ a strategy that leads to victory! Or just chill out and collect records and read books!

name: SeaDogs of Nassau
summary: Nassau lies in ruins. Its people look to you to restore it to its former glory. Will you loot, plunder, and decimate all who stand in your way as a pirate? Or will you use your strength and charisma to rise through the ranks of the Navy? Choose your path in this dynamic sandbox adventure.

name: Seven Sacred Beasts
summary:
Grow and evolve your monsters and then Summon and battle your monsters.
Dominate arenas to earn your spot as the greatest Summoner in the world!
They can also learn skills at Training Camps in town, and monster Eggs, along with other specific monsters, can evolve.

name: Sea Crypt: Infinite procedural dungeon crawler
summary:
Explore endless dungeons with your party, gather items and fight enemies!
An infinite number of Dungeons are waiting at the Sea Crypt! Pick a party member and fight your way through enemies in increasingly difficult levels. Explore the tunnels and loot items to equip your squad.

name: Seashells
summary: A short first-person horror exploration game that takes around 20-30 minutes to finish.

name: Serious Sam
summary: A port of Serious Sam: The First Encounter and Serious Sam: The Second Encounter for Xbox that compiles them into one cohesive game. Features a visual makeover with a redesigned menu and main character model which are far more cartoonish, alongside expanded story cutscenes.

name: Severen
summary: An upcoming game featuring interchangeable limbs that allow for new abilities and secret paths to be found.

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 6
summary: Adventures abound on the Sea of Thieves! Explore Sea Forts summoned from the Sea of the Damned, engage with Sea of Thieves’ evolving narrative in new Adventures and test your mettle on a new Voyage for Pirate Legends. Enjoy new Seasonal rewards, Trials, Deeds and more too!

name: Setback
summary: Setback is a fast-paced arena shooter and a new take on the traditional FPS. The core mechanic, “setbacking”, replaces death with a rewind through time and space.

name: SegaSonic the Hedgehog
summary: SegaSonic the Hedgehog is a 1992 LCD game which was used as a promotional item in Japan. They were found in UFO catchers. Three versions were created which only vary by the color and by what is drawn on the case. There was also a handy keychain attached to the case.

name: Sega Raceway
summary: A port of the LCD game Indy 500, without the Indy license.

name: Secret of the Vikings: Mystery island
summary: After a severe storm a group of Vikings and the brave Finnja strand on a strange island and face unknown challenges and dangers.

name: Sea Horizon
summary: "Sea Horizon" is a Roguelike turn-based RPG. You can explore the world by choosing different characters. Every journey can be unique and legendary. But don't forget the darkness is lurking. Choose your path wisely because every single step is essential.

name: Sexy Mystic Survivors
summary: Roguelite bullet-hell combat meets sexy anime action in Sexy Mystic Survivors, as you rise to the occasion to help gorgeous heroines destroy countless invading monsters. Plan your builds, upgrade heroines, and survive against the clock. Keep the heroines alive and they’ll be sure to reward you!

name: Search and Rescue
summary: Turn-based, strategy board game for up to 4 Players! Search, Rescue and Survive!

name: Sentinel 2: Earth Defense
summary:
It's war, and this time it's too close to home. The Martian mission may be over, but the aliens haven't finished playing space invaders yet.
Extraterrestrial eyes have turned to a new target: they want Earth, and you're the one that has to say 'no'!
The action takes place across varied, lushly rendered Earth environments, and the alien assault force has grown more vicious than ever. Luckily, human turret technology has also advanced, and the ship weapons system provides a spectacular new way to eradicate invaders!

name: SegaSonic Bros.
summary: A unreleased falling blocks puzzle game featuring different colored Sonic the Hedgehogs.

name: SenS
summary: In the Beginning was the Nothingness... Enter the Unknown, explore the Infinite, find your own SenS.

name: Seasons
summary: A precision platformer that each season introduces new mechanics and new challenges, in a beautiful and dangerous world, are you ready?

name: Seven Deadly Dates
summary: You've studied latin for a few months and you accidentally read a passage from your textbook which lands you in a demon speed dating bar. Unsure of how to get home, you decide to ride it out and see how things go. Maybe you'll even find a date! Or maybe you'll find death? Who knows...

name: Seasons
summary: Take a journey through the seasons across 48 unique levels. Seasons is 2d platformer with simple charming visuals, relaxing music and plenty of features for you to find along the way.

name: Seneca 7: A Cyberpunk Odyssey
summary: Build a new life in a cozy cyberpunk adventure RPG! Polluted air having you gasping for breath? Drowning in endless debt? Online dating getting you nowhere? Leave your worries behind and reboot your life on Seneca 7, where dreams come true!

name: Secrets of the Dark: Mystery of the Ancestral Estate & Secrets of the Dark: The Flower of Shadow
Secret Reflections Collection
summary:
The Secret Reflections Collection includes;
- Living Legends Ice Rose
- Shiver Poltergeist
- Brink of Consciousness Lonely Hearts Murders
- Depths of Betrayal
- Dark Arcana The Carnival
- Exorcist 3 Inception of Darkness

name: Secrets of the Dark: Temple of Night & Secrets of the Dark: Eclipse Mountain
Sewage
summary: Sewage is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame. You play a girl named Xuán Wō Zǐ. Like other fangames, the objective of the game is to explore the dream world and collect Items. Goods don't change the protagonist's form or do anything at all. Rather, they seem to be memories from the protagonist's past.

name: Second Soul
summary:
Aphwoakah is very lonely, Aphwoakah wants to make friends. Help Aphwoakah find some friends, so Aphwoakah isn't lonely anymore.

Go on an epic journey across the valley in search of friends for Aphwoakah.

Meet many unique, exciting potential friends.

Encounter thrilling places in which friends may be found.

name: Sex Chess
summary: Hell is about to get invaded and the sinners trapped inside are about to be freed. But the clueless liberators had no idea how cunning the Devil is. This time, the war between Light and Darkness will be waged not on the battlefield, but on a chess board.

name: Seishun Hajimemashita!
summary: Seishun Hajimemashita! is a visual novel for the PlayStation Portable.

name: Sega Mega Drive Portable Video Game Player
summary: The Blaze Entertainment version of the Arcade Portable handheld, manufactured by AtGames. In this version, Sonic Spinball was added in place of Ristar.

name: Sega Mega Drive Portable Video Game Player: Streets of Rage Special Edition
Sega Genesis Ultimate Portable Game Player
summary: The 80 Games version only includes 40 Mega Drive/Genesis games, however it also has 40 AtGames developed games to bring the total up to the stated 80.

name: Sega Archives from USA Vol. 3
summary: Sega Archives from USA Vol. 3 is a compilation of seven Mega Drive games, emulated for the PC in Japan. It has the same games as Sega Smash Pack 2 except Sega Swirl. It marks the first time Vectorman 2 was released in Japan (and possibly outside the US in general).

name: Senna Oaks Spaceship Trip
summary: Fly Senna Oak's damaged spaceship while the controls are gradually failing!

name: Senninha GP Racing
summary: Senninha GP is a brazilian arcade racing game, where you play with the characters from Senninha's Gang, racing in many famous tracks

name: Second Thoughts
summary: Second Thoughts is a psychological text-based game where each day you are tasked with executing someone based on the limited information provided until one person remains with their full story revealed.

name: Search All: Bitcoin
summary: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the bitcoins in a large location. Bitcoins will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Search All: Birds
summary: A hidden object game in which you need to find all the birds in a large location. The birds will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Sentinel Attack
summary: Sentinel Attack will have you play as both Justin and Erica in horizontal shooter and metroidvania stages as you battle in space and explore the many levels of the Sentinel station.

name: Secret Backrooms
summary: A Liminal Horror Game, Run And Figure out ways to escape and advance into the next level until you eventually return to the real world

name: Sex Search 2: Ultimate
summary: Plunge into the world of relaxation and light erotica! Mindfulness logic game with many modes.

name: Seamless
summary: Seamless is a 2D puzzle-platformer with a minimalistic style and unique mechanics

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 7
summary: In Season Seven of Sea of Thieves, players can now name their ships, customize them, save loads between sessions and much more.

name: Self Made Man: Life of an Entrepreneur
summary: Start from nothing, develop your business and become the richest man in the world in an immersive first-person management game. Self Made Man puts you in the shoes of a successful entrepreneur. Customize your business and make the right decisions to build your fortune.

name: Security Booth: Director's Cut
summary: Based in 1996, you work for a science lab known as Nova Nexus. You work as a security guard at the front gate of Nova Nexus inside a guard booth. However, tonight it seems something important is happening inside of Nova Nexus and things are... well... a little strange.

name: Sega Ages Vol. 1: Shukudai ga Tant-R
summary: A compilation for the Sega Saturn.

name: Sega Ages Vol. 3: OutRun
summary: The Saturn Port of "OutRun".

name: Sega Ages Vol. 4: After Burner II
summary: A Sega Saturn port of arcade game After Burner II. This port was released in North America as part of Sega Ages and Europe as part of Sega Ages Volume 1.

name: Sega Ages Vol. 5: Rouka ni Ichidant-R
summary: Sega Ages Rouka ni Ichidant-R is a compilation released under the "Sega Ages" line for the Sega Saturn. It includes a port of Puzzle & Action: Ichidant-R and Quiz Rouka ni Tattenasai!. It was released exclusively in Japan in 1996.

name: Sega Ages Vol. 6: Fantasy Zone
summary: Fantasy Zone is an arcade style shooter for one or two players. The goal is to destroy all of the creatures on each planet and collect as many of the lost coins as possible. At the end of each level is a large enemy that will have to be defeated before moving on to the next world. At various points in the game, the player will be able to find a parts shop, which allows purchasing improvements for his spaceship, including better weapons and faster engines.

name: Sega Ages Vol. 10: Power Drift
summary: Power Drift is an arcade racer. There are 5 tracks to choose from, each with 5 stages. The stages range from cities, to deserts to tracks over water. There are also 12 drivers to pick from, from businessmen to skinheads and mohicans.

name: Sega Ages Vol. 12: Galaxy Force II
summary: Sega Ages Galaxy Force II is a port of Galaxy Force II for the Sega Saturn. It adds difficulty settings and an in-game story screen.

name: Sea Bubble Burst
summary: Closely resembling Bubble Bobble, Sea Bubble Burst stars Bubbly, an underwater creature with the power to trap creatures in bubbles, then pop them to turn them into fruit. Eliminate all enemies on a level to proceed to the next level. Includes 20 levels.

name: Sesame Street Create & Draw in Elmo's world
Sesame Street Art Workshop
summary: A Sesame Street-themed activity pack that allows players to insert stickers onto scenes, color in images, dress up characters, or draw freely.

name: Sea Monsters: A Prehistoric Adventure
summary:
DS Port of "Sea Monsters: A Prehistoric Adventure"

In the oceans of earth millions of years ago, danger was never far away and monsters lurked in every shadow. Experience this astounding world by playing as six different prehistoric marine reptiles, each with special skills – from extreme speed to thick armor and powerful crunching jaws.

Start your adventure in an area of inland sea that will only get more dangerous as time passes. Take on foes, hunt for prey and unlock hidden challenges. Your goal is to find a way to truly escape these waters. How to accomplish your escape is something you’ll have to figure out on your journey. Now take control of your first Sea Monster and begin your adventure!

Control 6 different prehistoric sea monsters. Each of the six sea monsters is completely unique. Six unique zones in the underwater environment. Play as both the hunter and hunted.

name: Secret Cat Forest
summary:
Nowadays playing games can often be stressful than relaxing…

So why not play this whenever you feel like relaxing and befriending cats?
Craft items/furniture the kitties love!
Craft them one by one, and the most adorable kitties will appear… maybe…

name: Seduction: A Monk's Fate
summary: Survive in a dark realm in hopes of saving a young woman’s soul from being used in a forbidden ritual!

name: Secrets of the Valley
summary: Secrets of the Valley tells the story of a man who ran away from a troubled past in search of a future worth living.

name: Seqitaire
summary: Seqitaire is a Solitaire-inspired, number-crunching puzzle game.

name: Seres
summary: There are more than 300 countries on the continent of Seres, more than 6,000 units of Knights, and a lot of events. Which country to choose? What kind of Knights' combination? How to deploy the Knights to the Member countries?Players can make their own decisions to unify the Seres continent .

name: Sexy Gym
summary: I love going to the gym! Guide Morris through his training at this unique gym as he gets intimate with his trainer! Fix your diet, get familiar with the equipment, boost your stamina, and hone your focus to see your trainer in glorious Live2D action!

name: Sexy Sharks
summary: Short Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring 3 shark girls on the beach with different personalities and fetishes.

name: Sengoku Princess
summary: After a "time slip" the first person you run into is a female Nobunaga Oda?! Can the worst possible outcome be avoided?!

name: Seven Seas
summary: Sail across the seas and hunt down pirate ships. Enter a turn-based combat mode and control your fleet across the naval battle area. Utilize a variety of weapons and tactical means to either sink or board enemy ships and defeat them before they make the next move.

name: Seven Doorways
summary:
Inspired by the idea of daily exploration, Seven Doorways presents you with a different environment depending on which day of the week it is when you run it.

It's an exercise in slowing down and not worrying about goals or mechanics. There's nothing to do but hang out for a little while and enjoy your surroundings. Feel no pressure to stay, leave when you want and visit again another day for a new experience.

name: Secret Tea Garden
summary:
Every customer desires their own blend of tea and it's your job to brew and deliver! All the while avoiding hazards and keeping an eye on the time!

Everyone you serve has a uniquely generated appearance, you can even customise how you look by using your copy ability!

name: Sega Fun Pack: Sonic and the Secret Rings & Super Monkey Ball Banana Blitz
summary: Sega Fun Pack: Sonic and the Secret Rings & Super Monkey Ball Banana Blitz is a game compilation for the Wii which contains two games: Sonic and the Secret Rings and Super Monkey Ball Banana Blitz.

name: Serflings
summary: Serflings is a remake of The Settlers, also known as Serf City: Life is Feudal in some countries. It is a city-building video game with real-time strategy elements.

name: Seeking Light
summary: Seeking Light is an action adventure game in isometric perspective with a focus on boss fights. Fight your fears as Sunny and overcome the demons of your past. Explore your inner world, facing the personification of your phobias, and discover the story behind them.

name: Selenelion
summary: A portal back to August, Friday the 13th, 2021.

name: Seasons of the Sorcerer
summary: Seasons of the Sorcerer is a top-down action game set to Antonio Vivaldi's "Four Seasons.” Use a diverse set of spells to incinerate, bash, transform, and control your foes on a year long journey across early Renaissance Italy.

name: Server Owner Tycoon
summary: Server Owner Tycoon has you step into the shoes of a game server owner to build your own online empire. Manage your staff members, catch the latest trends, keep users satisfied, research new features, and administer your server. Do you have what it takes to become the best server owner?

name: Secrets of Light and Shadow
summary: Bundle includes: LIT: Bend the Light Bend and In My Shadow.

name: Seeker: My Shadow
summary: Seeker: My Shadow is a VR adventure that utilizes the versatility and possibilities of VR, sending players of all ages to an immersive adventure! You control a Giant Spirit while assisting Kippo, a small and adorable Seeker, through various puzzle levels. Go solo or solve the levels in co-op mode!

name: Secret of Sardinia
summary: Swim through a desolate underwater world to discover the truth of your lost civilization. As the last sardine in Sardinia, you must translate ancient fragments, listen to the voices of the dead, and rebuild a forgotten mythology as you uncover the deepest secrets of the sea.

name: Senpai and the Mysterious Dungeon
summary: To save the kidnapped senpai and also the beloved one, Fulla decides to challenge the dungeon on the island inhabited by demons. This is a traditional 2D roguelike RPG. Every time you enter the dungeon, the layout will change! Use various skills and equipment to save your senpai!!

name: Sealer of Dungeons
summary: Sealer of Dungeons is an action-shooter with Rogue-lite elements. Play Sealers on their journey, you will find great treasures and abilities to seal the unknown evil above. Gather precious loot, discover hidden secrets, and chat with merchants to get powerful items. Seal the dungeon, save the world!

Without the room! SenSense does not try to copy a physical room in any way. Rather, it focuses on the multiplayer and puzzle solving aspects of an escape game: you get to feel the manic shared energy as you race the clock to piece together clues, in search of those satisfying "aha" moments when everything clicks into place.

SenSense is a series of multiplayer challenges. In each challenge, each player will receive a different piece of the same puzzle. You will need to work together to solve it. name: Secret of Mana: Relocalized
summary:
Secret of Mana - Relocalized focuses on updating, uncensoring, and "relocalizing" gameplay, graphical, and text (both script and non-script) elements of Secret of Mana.

Death Machine: AKA Kettle Kin gets restored to its full uncensored chainsaw wielding glory. Not only is this a graphical hack, it also rewrites its AI to perform just as it did in the original Japanese release.

Teleportation Circles: When Square released this game in 1993 Nintendo of America had strict policies against religious imagery appearing in its titles. The six-pointed stars in the teleportation circles were reduced to triangles. This hack restores them to their original appearance.

Title Screen Background: When Square ported this game over to English, they butchered the original background image. Because of some graphical problems they cropped the image of the full Mana Tree at its roots and expanded it. The result is a blurry pixelated mess. Relocalized restores the original image.

Opening Text Crawl: Relocalized updates the opening text crawl to that of the superior HD version.

Mixed Case Character Names: This features adds lowercase letters to the character naming screen.

Relocalization: The titular feature. This hack takes the game’s outdated, awkward, and inaccurate text and script elements and localizes them differently. Just like with FuSoYa’s hack before it, Relocalized holds true to the style of beloved 90’s Squaresoft translator, Ted Woolsey.

name: See The Sky
summary:
See the sky is one such story book, a festive-themed Christmas present released for Apple Macintosh in 1992 as a series of HyperCard stacks. In 1996 it was re-released in a remastered form: as an interactive CD-ROM, produced using Macromedia Director, which added ambient music and navigation to the original images. Also released in 1996 was a printed book of the story, presented as 3 images per page. Finally, in 1999 a CD-R of the combined HyperCard stacks was released.

This is a new version of "See the sky" for Playdate, which adds chapter navigation similar to the CD-ROM version.

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 12
summary:
Bring new thrills and tactics to your Voyages with Sea of Thieves Season 12's audacious assortment of weapons and tools, all available to deploy from April 30th, 2024!

Sea of Thieves Season 12 adds two new weapons in Double-Barrel Flintlock Pistol and Throwing Knives. The Double-Barrel Flintlock Pistol, as the name suggests, can fire two bullets in either rapid succession or both at the same time. It is said to be designed for more close-range combat. Throwing Knives, meanwhile, are very versatile as they have three ways to attack. You can either use them to do a melee stab, which can be charged or uncharged, as well as for a range-throwing attack.

Sea of Thieves Season 12 is confirmed to add several new tools to the game, so here is the list of everything that will be added:

- Scattershot: A new type of ammunition that fires four small cannonballs in a short range but widespread.
- Bone Caller: A new throwable that can spawn three skeletons that’ll aid you in battle.
- Wind Caller: A shell that can, as the name suggests, call wind. It can be used to speed your ships, blow the timber out of your foes, prevent fall damage, and so much more.

Besides these tools, there will be two neat QoL additions:
- Ziplines: New ziplines will be added across the map.
- Harpoon line travel: The rope that you create with your harpoon can now be walked, but beware, you’ll have to balance or you’ll fall off.

“Would you dare to betray with me?”

Unexpectedly meeting death during a mission, “I” am confronted by a mysterious “voice”
And so, the “voice” offers “me” a shocking deal.

Can this daring mission and deal be successfully completed?
To survive, I must win both his heart and his body!

name: Sets
summary:
Three symbols appear in the centre of the screen as a vertical column and the player has to move them to one of 4 sets of 3 columns by pressing up, down, left or right. The idea is to build up lines of 3 matching symbols horizontally or diagonally to score points and gain a little time. The faster you make decisions the longer you will last, but the more mistakes you will make.

The author's personal best score is 9600, can you beat that?

Inspired by a video game popular in Belgian bars.

Features a high score table and redefinable keys. Joysticks and Zon-X sound supported.

name: Sector Zero

name: Seascape Paradiso

Underwater photographer Jay has always had a passion for the ocean. She'd never tell you that she thinks she's seen it all...but she'd have to admit that she never thought she'd meet a real-life mermaid on a dive!

But bubbly and mysterious Echo disappears nearly as soon as Jay meets her. Can the two of them reunite, or will it be a one-time encounter?

name: Sex Kitten Sim-Date 2

name: Sex Kitten Sim-Date 5

name: Secret Neighbor: Welcome Pack

name: SeekIt: The Isle of Mem

name: SeekIt: Max Dublin's Treasure
summary:
Max Dublin's Treasure is a trivia learning game for the Apple II.

Max Dublin has hidden his treasure of silver, gold, and jewels throughout the land, and has unfortunately torn the treasure map into pieces. With the aid of Mr. Light, the player must retrieve the map pieces to Max Dublin's three treasures. The player must travel with Max Dublin to a number of exotic locales, and using the New Book of Knowledge Encyclopedia Volume A published by Grolier, must answer questions about these locations. Correctly answered questions help the player locate map pieces. As the player travels, they must spend money to refuel their plane, and they risk running out of fuel money before collecting all map pieces if they do not answer enough questions correctly. After collecting all pieces for the silver map, the player progresses to the more challenging gold and jewel maps. As the player searches for treasure, a mystery man wearing a bandanna attempts to sabotage the player's effort by stealing money or fuel if questions are answered incorrectly.

name: Search All: Veggies

Sentimental Gensoukyou is short adventure visual novel developed by Seventh Heaven Maxion using Live Maker engine. The game features 12 different scenes which can be choosen freely by player to determine route and storylines.

name: Seiken Densetsu: Final Fantasy Gaiden

name: Set Yourself on Fire

name: Sealed

name: Secret of the Solstice
summary:
Secret of the Solstice is a Korean MMORPG developed by DNC Entertainment. Players pick a class, fight monsters, and complete quests to level up in a world of cute 2D sprites.

US Secret of the Solstice was subsequently shut down by its publisher 'Outspark' for 'undisclosed reasons'. Any and all time and real money that players put into the game was lost. However Outspark offered a character merge to 'Solstice Reborn' a beta of a new release of Solstice. On October 24, 2011, the Beta was released for 1 week until it closed and Outspark removed all traces of its existence. Outspark also shut down their forums for comments on 'Solstice'.

name: Sector 666

Now they are getting ready to sacrifice him to provide the Demon of Darkness with limitless power, and it's up to you to stop them! summary:
Every four years, there is a leap year...
And if leap day falls on a Thursday...

Then that day is...

Secret Thursday.

summary: Search Dungeon Master is an exciting hidden object puzzle game set in a medieval dungeon setting. This game is a great way to relax after a hard day and get away from problems.

It has 8 mainline maps and 1 secret map.

Battle the dark and magical werecreatures that want to sacrifice your friend in this macabre hidden object puzzle adventure game!

name: Sex In The Block
summary: In this exciting game, you explore a luxurious high-rise complex searching for beautiful women to flirt with. Win their hearts with your charm through fun mini-games. As they fall for you, they'll send amazing photos as rewards. Dive into this captivating world and become the ultimate flirt master!

summary: Serenity (SERENITY.WAD) is a Doom episode replacement mod of eight levels, created by Bjorn Hermans and Holger Nathrath. The WAD was followed by two sequels by the same authors, Eternity and Infinity.

name: See You...
summary:
Worried about your friend, you stop by his apartment to check in on him...only to discover he's nowhere to be seen and the apartment is barricaded and bloodied.

See You... is a horror-themed Game Boy Color point & click prototype that lasts only a few minutes.

name: Second Wind
summary: Second Wind is a roguelike RPG in which you'll explore random dungeons as you battle monsters, upgrade your equipment and complete quests. You can choose and unlock new characters to play with, each character has 3 stats: dexterity, power and armor, which will increase or decrease during your adventure. Each character also has 3 unique battle moves, use them wisely!

name: Sega vs. Capcom: The Next Level
summary: Sega vs. Capcom: The Next Level is a fan game made by Madxruler that crosses over the two major franchises, resembling the combat style of Tatsunoko vs. Capcom.

name: Sea of Stars: Throes of the Watchmaker

In this magical land where denizens are threatened by a cursed carnival, our heroes will need to adapt to unfamiliar rules if their Sun and Moon powers are to manifest.

name: Secret Of World
summary: Secret of World is an MMORPG that immerses players in a vast, dynamic world where they can choose from four distinct characters, each endowed with unique and special abilities. The game features a balanced gameplay style with a focus on Player vs. Monster (PvM) content, making up 70% of the experience, while Player vs. Player (PvP) battles account for the remaining 30%. Players can align themselves with one of the three powerful empires, each offering its own challenges and rewards. In Secret of World, strategy, skill, and alliances are key as you navigate a world filled with danger, adventure, and intense competition.

name: Seoul 2033: Shelter
summary:
Manage the Shelter in Seoul, devastated since the nuclear explosion.

'SEOUL 2033 : Shelter' takes place in ruined city of Seoul after a nuclear explosion. As the Shelter 1 Administrator, you manage the shelter to survive.

name: Seoul 2033: Yusijin
summary: A short prequel in Seoul 2033. On that day of a nuclear explosion, we have to find our daughter in a confused city.

name: Sega Brawlers Megamix
summary: Sega Brawlers Megamix is a beat'em up style brawler game featuring many of Sega's classic characters and guests from the Sega Genesis days, with a total of 92 playable characters.

name: Seed of Heroes
summary: Seed of Heroes is a bullet heaven game where players take on the role of warriors seeking glorious battles and get into the halls of Valhalla. Journey through various realms, take on hordes of enemies, collect treasures, and defeat bosses that will try to stop you. Pass the trials and tribulations and prepare for the Ragnarok.

name: Senpai ga Watashi no Mousou ni Doujin Suru?!: Body Touch ni Goyoujin
Secret Agent Clank
summary:
A port of Secret Agent Clank, a platform video game developed by High Impact Games and published by Sony Computer Entertainment, released for the PlayStation Portable (PSP) in 2008.

In the game, Clank dons his "Secret Agent Clank" persona, which was previously seen in brief TV show segments within the main series. The story revolves around Clank working to clear Ratchet's name after Ratchet is framed for a crime he did not commit. The gameplay diverges from the traditional Ratchet & Clank format, focusing more on stealth and gadget-based play, though it retains the series' trademark humour and style.

The port is enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Seeking Cat
summary: In "Seeking Cat," explore a cozy, cluttered room filled with cleverly hidden cats. Can you uncover all the hidden cats and become the ultimate cat finder?

name: Sea Sniffers
summary: Sea Sniffers is a cozy diving game in which you explore the ocean with your trusty seal companion. Encounter strange creatures and exotic treasures in sunken ships or hidden caves. Discover the deep sea and all its secrets!

name: Seifuku Kanojo: Mayoigo Engage
summary:
In Fukuoka's Kurume, there lives a shy female student voice actor named Yumeha Nitahara. With her timid nature, she rarely receives work offers. Just as she is about to give up, a new transfer student, the protagonist, suddenly appears before her.

"I'm Yumeha's manager now!"

A relationship between a voice actor and her manager begins with a lie. Then, one day, a certain job opportunity comes Yumeha's way. The two, still struggling to fully grow up, repeatedly drift apart and come closer together. And eventually, this leads to love.

name: Serke
summary: Serke is a hack and slash game where you fight against a virus invasion. Use 5 different weapons to defeat your enemies and save the virtual world.

name: Sea Rescue
summary:
A game from 2009 that was distributed with Nestles Cereals. In the game the player controls a helicopter based on an Eurocopter MH-65 Dolphin.

Rescue people from the water and transport them to the safety boat. Learn how to fly your helicopter. Use the radar to help you and rescue everyone before time runs out. Your helicopter has limited capacity, so you will need to make multiple trips.

name: Sea of Stars: Dawn of Equinox
summary: Free update adding local cooperative play, combat 2.0, revamped prologue, bonus cinematic scene, speedrunner mode, difficulty presets, improved parrot relic, Quebecois localization and quality of life improvements.

name: Seaside Drive
summary: Nothing's more relaxing than a nice long drive by the sea... complete with plenty of gunfire!

name: Sepulchron
summary: An atmospheric puzzle-horror game where you have 72 in-game hours to escape with your life. Solve challenging puzzles that require logical deduction during the day, survive assaults from hostile ghosts at night, and uncover the mystery behind Astor Manor.

name: Sex Twice Hentai
summary: A puzzle game for Java.

name: Sexy Memory Puzzle: Pool Massage
summary: Solve the puzzles to reveal and collect pictures of a sexy girl receiving a sexual massage by the pool, hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match. Flip two cards, and if the numbers on them match, they will be removed from the board, revealing a unique image.

name: Sevver Levvel
summary:
_SEVVER_LEVVEL_ is a limit-removing DOOM 2 WAD consisting of 11 base maps and 6 secret maps. It focuses on hectic spontaneous gameplay and features a few weapon and balance changes as well as two brand new enemies.
This mapset was inspired by Snowy44's favorite vibes, aesthetics, media and music. It features a variety of level types, ranging from small exploration-based ones to big arenas.

name: Set with Friends
summary: An online version of the classic card game SET, which is a puzzle card game that can be played alone or with others

name: Secret Agent Wizard Boy and the International Crime Syndicate
summary: Secret Agent Wizard Boy must go undercover to topple Grumblemort's evil crime syndicate, hidden beneath his wizarding school. Learn spells, engage in espionage, and spread utter lore-unfriendly chaos.

name: Second Stellar
summary: Second Stellar is a horde roguelike that focuses on engaging gameplay and buildcrafting. Fight through swaths of enemies and powerful bosses as two characters simultaneously, wielding unique weaponry and discovering potent combinations in pursuit of the galaxy's many secrets.

name: Seekers of Darkness
summary: Dive into "Seekers of Darkness," a thrilling deck-building roguelike RPG with intense card battles and tower defense RTS elements. Unlock powerful characters, build unique strategies with over 70 cards, and compete in offline rankings. Burn enemies, freeze them, or overpower with weapons. Enjoy!!

name: Serial Victims
summary: Serial Victims is a 3D psychological horror game that immerses you in the nightmares of individuals who fell prey to serial killers. In Serial Victims, you embody each victim, racing against time to uncover clues, call for help, and do what you can before the inevitable happens.

name: Sensitive
summary: Sensitive is a puzzle game released in 1991 for the Commodore 64. The player controls a small square, navigating it across a grid of tiles. The challenge lies in the fact that some of the tiles disappear after being stepped on, and the objective is to reach the exit without falling off the grid. The game requires careful planning and strategic movement, as each level increases in difficulty with more complex tile patterns and obstacles. Its minimalistic yet challenging design paired with its great music has made Sensitive a memorable classic for C64 fans.

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 14
summary: Roguery rules the waves in Sea of Thieves Season 14: Making Mischief!

name: Settlers of Catan
summary:
Settlers of Catan is a turn-based strategy fangame for MS-DOS based on the boardgame of the same name.

Settlers of Catan game description
The object of the game is to be the first player to gain the specified number of victory points during your turn. If you somehow manage to gain the appropriate number of points during an opponent’s turn, you must wait until the end of your next turn before you can win the game (assuming no one else manages to win before then). The number of victory points required to win depends on the scenario being played. the game constantly displays the number of victory points you currently have, as well as the number that you need to win. You gain victory points in five ways: building settlements, upgrading settlements to cities, deploying the largest army, building the longest trade route, and gaining victory point cards. Settlements built in a region where you did not begin with a settlement gain an extra victory point.

name: Seven Seas: Adventures
summary: Welcome to the Seven Seas: Adventures! Set sail and chart your course to fame, fortune, and adventure in this unique age of sail sandbox game!

name: Secret Puzzle Society
summary: Help your friend Brooke in a mysterious investigation as she tries to expose the Secret Puzzle Society behind the masks. Beat puzzles, master mini-games, and conquer match-3 levels to uncover clues.

name: Sesari 1

name: Secret Bureau
summary:
Secret Bureau is an exhilarating single-player, first-person adventure game available for both PC and Virtual Reality (PCVR Meta) in the same software package.

Players will navigate hostile territories, infiltrate enemy bunkers, disguise themselves, and engage with spies to thwart the nefarious plans of the Betalog Corporation. The game combines intense action with strategic gameplay, encouraging players to overcome a variety of challenges to achieve their mission.

Designed with a cinematic concept reminiscent of blockbuster franchises like “Mission: Impossible” and “007.”

name: Senioritis
summary:
Senioritis is a 2D retro-themed platformer about high school. Play as Julian "JD" Davenport and defeat his homework assignments! Watch out for neighborhood douchebag, Quince Vanderson!

Do you have what it takes to graduate?

name: Select Oblige
summary: Select Oblige is the latest title from the popular Japanese visual novel brand Madosoft. It features character design and artwork by renowned illustrator Hiyo Yuzuna, with the story crafted by Shoukei Wakaba. The main heroines are voiced by Hana Akino, Kanau, Ren Sagami, and Yuuka Nanakusa.

name: Sethi and the Inca Wizard
summary: la Qoyä, the wife of the emperor is dying from a strange curse. This is no surprise you will help. As Sethi, and with your companion Pepi, you decide to investigate to defeat the enemies of the Empire. You will have to explore places such as Cuzco, Lake Titicaca, the Mountain of the Spirits, the Temple of the Sun, and so on, talk to people, find and use items. Since this game is educational, you will learn about the culture of the Incas.

name: Semper Fidelis
summary: Semper Fidelis is a collection of 3 maps for Doom II that use plenty of Boom trickery to make this poor marine's hostile experience even more interesting.

name: Sesame Street Sports
summary: All sports from the home console version are featured, except for the exercise one, all of which are now played in 2D.

name: Sex Education
summary: Sex Education Embark on an exciting journey by matching positions using the handles. Unlock satisfying results through quick time events, and progress to unlock unique skins and styles. Enjoy diverse adventures in various locations!

name: Senpai Puzzle: Waifu Summer
summary: The free swapping puzzle game with stunning 4K Waifus, 10 free Waifus, beautiful Waifu gallery, chill lofi music, and customizable settings. Experience the sizzling allure of Waifu Summer today!

name: September 1998
summary: Something isn't right in Kitz River. The people are superstitious and they believe the GOATBOY is watching so you best behave.

name: Seisho 1999
summary: Seisho 1999, also known as Bible 1999, is an unreleased RPG game that was in development by Imagineer / Wavejack for the Famicom.

name: Settle and Battle: New Empires
summary: A homage to classic real-time strategy games. Gather resources, build an empire, and command powerful armies to conquer the world. Lead six unique tribes, expand your territory, and engage in epic battles with hundreds of units on screen. Dominate in 18 missions and procedurally generated maps!

name: Septic
summary: Septic is a gripping precision platformer where you navigate an underground sewer, mastering challenging jumps and dealing with significant setbacks. Test your skills and perseverance in this intense escape adventure.

name: Sexdivers
summary: SEXDIVERS is an intense survival shooter where you play as a fighter escorting a scientific expedition on a mysterious uninhabited planet.

name: Search Eye Plus V2.0
summary: A competitive puzzle game for 1 or 2 players released only in South Korea by Yung Sung Electronics.

name: Serena
summary:
"I wish she could remember our days together."

Serena is a short story where we meet a white-haired girl and, in turn, discover that she needs our blood to survive.

Why does she seem so sad? Will I be able to do anything for her?

name: Senpai and the Mysterious Island
summary: An RPG where you get to uncover the secrets of a mysterious island inhabited by succubi that was rumored to contain a lost ancient technology. Play as either the warrior Hula Elstia, or Sonia Lanternlily to a variety of combat styles, and dress them up with various outfits.

name: Seedbo And That Time The Sun Exploded
summary: Re-assemble the sun in this bite-sized adventure platformer!

name: Seal of Solitomb
summary: Use your solitaire skills to assemble sweet combos and defeat the dungeon's monsters. Grab treasure and spend it on powerful, synergistic abilities. Manage both your own resources and the demon's patience to hopefully survive the ordeal.

name: Secrets in Green
summary: When a pretty plant in Alma's garden begins to speak to her, she knows that a dark mystery is afoot! But in Victorian England, women are often dismissed as nothing more than hysterical fantasists. Can you help Alma find her power, and solve this dangerous situation before it's too late?

name: Sex Club Simulator
summary: SEX CLUB Simulator is a wild adult clicker game where you step into the shoes of a strip club manager on a mission to make the hottest spot in town.

name: Sea Town: Fish Market Simulator
summary: Build your fishing empire in Sea Town - Fish Market Simulator! Explore oceans, upgrade boats, and conquer a dynamic market across unique islands. Ready to rule the seas? Start now!

name: Secret of the Abbey
summary: Embark on a journey through the underground of an 18th-century abbey. As you explore the abbey, you'll encounter a series of puzzles that reveal its mysterious past. Unravel the secrets that led to the abbey's demise in this atmospheric adventure.

name: Senpai Sentinel
summary: Step into the world of LunaAkari, a beloved anime streamer who vanished under chilling circumstances during a live broadcast. As a devoted fan and member of the “Moonlit Guardians” fan club, you’ve been tasked with remotely monitoring her otaku-themed house to uncover the truth behind her mysterious disappearance.

name: Sentinel Agency
summary: As a special investigator on a theme park island full of dinosaurs, you have to solve three murders while hidden forces try to stop you with brute force. Shoot, sneak, uncover secrets, survive.

name: Sector Beam
summary: A small arcade game where the player needs to destroy asteroids of different colors using an energy beam. The cannon, controlled by the player, automatically targets the nearest asteroid but only within one of four sectors. To succeed, the player must select one of the four surrounding sectors and shoot the closest asteroid with a beam of the matching color. The score multiplier increases as long as no mistakes are made but resets to the base value if an error occurs. There is also a rank multiplier that increases upon reaching specific milestones. Scoring a million points is considered an excellent result, though it’s far from the limit. The game ends if an asteroid hits the platform three times.

name: Sezhar's Shell Cells
summary:
Just imagine that you died and some day just woke up, but not at home like you wanted to, but in an endless void of... nothing?
Sezhar isn't mad at you, she is just frustrated.
Be so nice and endure her wrath a bit longer. :)

name: Severance
summary: Severance is a handcrafted, stop motion survival horror in which you take the shoes of Elias, a father trapped in the town of Decipit with a breakout of paste-like shapeshifting creatures known as collage.

name: Secret Mode's Cozy Collection
summary: A Little to the Left is a cozy puzzle game that has you sort, stack, and organize household items into pleasing arrangements while you keep an eye out for a mischievous cat with an inclination for chaos.

name: Sebastian's Quest
summary: In Sebastian's Quest, you have to shove gems and find the cheese.

name: Seafarer's Gambit
summary: Play as a captain who ventures into new lands with his crewmates until a storm passing by mysteriously parts him away from his ship and crew. Help the captain find his missing crew and overcome the challenges on the path by fighting unwanted guests using his trusty old sword.

name: Seitokai no Ichizon: DS Suru Seitokai
summary: You take control of Sugisaki Ken, the sole male member of Hekiyou Academy's student council. Your mission is to make the rest of the student council members his harem by Christmas Day by improving popularity for nine months from April to December.

name: Search Account
summary: Real Escape Game.

name: Sense Off: A Sacred Story in the Wind
summary:
The protagonist of the story, Naoya, was hospitalised after getting in a bicycle accident. During his treatment, it is found that he exhibits a number of unusual brain wave patterns, and he is asked to move into a particular Cognition Dynamics Research Laboratory to undergo further testing, along with a handful of other young people who exhibit similar characteristics. With his newfound friends, Naoya takes classes, has fun and lives peacefully in blissful ignorance of the truth behind their gathering together.

While it is difficult to say much about the story without spoiling a good deal of the enjoyment, 'sense off' is not a title to underestimate, and in whichever route you end up going down, the story will quickly spiral into something far more intricate and detailed than you likely thought possible.

name: Sega Kara for Dreamcast
summary: Sega Kara for Dreamcast was a karaoke game for the Sega Dreamcast which was bundled with the Dreamcast Karaoke peripheral.

name: Self Layout Shooter
summary: Self Layout Shooter plays like your average Shoot'em Up...but there's a catch: Each round you have to place your own enemies.

name: Seeker of the Ruins
summary: As a fearless dwarf delver, navigate interesting underground labyrinths & ruins, uncover hidden treasures, solve riddles and hide from monsters. Use various items and potions to survive and outsmart environmental hazards in this immersive non-combat adventure. Delve into the unknown and reclaim lost treasures!

name: Seeds of Power Bundle: Weedcraft Inc & Cultist Simulator: Anthology
summary: Grow your cult and weed empire in this unique, strategic bundle.

name: Secret Agent Puzzle
summary: Dr. Von Bösenstein is plotting to take over the world and you’re the only one that can stop her! Ensure she can’t complete any of the “world domination”-inators by navigating your way through intricate puzzle rooms. Avoid traps, don’t get stuck, solve the rooms and most important of all… a cat?

name: Sensational Studios: Underswap
summary: Take on the role of a small human, as you explore an all new dynamic reimaging of the hit classic game UNDERTALE. Continue to decide the fate of monster kind's perception of humanity when faced with new unique surprises, and challenging obstacles. All in a world where no one has to die, again!

name: Session: Skate Sim Year One & Two Edition
summary: With the Year One & Two Edition of Session: Skate Sim, you get the base game and lots of additional content. Ride the most iconic spots, explore unique maps, meet and play as professional skaters.

name: Session: Skate Sim - Year Two Pack
summary: Get all the game's additional content released between 1 January 2024 and 31 December 2024 in a single pack, and find your new spots in three additional maps, including a school and two iconic locations in Europe: Paris and Prague.

name: SEMP 64
summary:
This is a super easy multiplayer platformer, or SEMP for short.
So it's a 3D platformer, with online multiplayer and it's super easy
(Disclaimer: it's actually super difficult and not super easy)

Climb to the very top of the super huge level.
Fall down and... well try again I guess. Maybe you where lucky and able to save yourself onto a near platform. Or you lost hours of progress, who knows what'll happen.

Play alone, join the global lobby or host your own 4 player lobby for your friends.
But let's be real, it's much more fun to see tons of players fall down... I mean climb up the world.

Already mastered the game? Well respect. But what now?
Hop into the level editor and build your own levels! Let's see if you can make players rage quit even faster than I could.

name: Seeking Adventure
summary:
A 2d, search and find adventure RPG about clicking things and finding stuff. Adventure through a map of hand crafted levels helping villagers, overcoming challenges and looting chests to find your place in this medieval fantasy world.

The game blends dice rolling mechanics with hidden object and point and click adventure games to bring a unique blend of genre to the table.

name: Serpent Wine
summary: A fantasy yuri visual novel about the travelers Selindae and Lynolell's hunt for a cryptid. A short stand-alone story set after the events of Prisoner of the Mist, created for the Trans Joy Jam 2025.

name: Secrets by Episode
summary: Explore a world of sweet and spicy romance. You're the main character in these interactive stories, and your choices shape how each chapter unfolds.

name: Settler's Domain
summary: Settler's Domain is a settlement-building game with citizen and resource management elements. Build structures, recruit settlers, gather resources, and explore your surroundings.

name: Seek
summary: In this game, you play as Alice, an girl trapped in a twisted, ever-changing world. Survive a frozen orphanage filled with lurking horrors, eerie classical music, and unsolved mysteries. Scavenge, evade monsters, and uncover the truth. But can you face the brutal reality—or remain trapped forever?

name: Serene Seasons
summary: Serene Seasons is a Minecraft mod that adds seasons. Grass and foliage colors will change throughout the year, and in the winter, temperatures will shift and allow for snow to fall in some biomes that don't normally receive any. Seasons also affect various other features, like crop growth, weather, and more!

name: Seafarer: The Ship Sim
summary: Embark on the ultimate maritime experience with Seafarer: The Ship Sim. Choose between careers, take the helm of a variety of ships, and expand your fleet. Navigate a vast open world and become immersed in the beautiful expanses and rolling waves.

name: Sea Struggles
summary: Engage in naval combat with or against your friends in this frenetic online multiplayer game, where every move is fair game.Collect resources to upgrade your ship and weapons.

name: Seleos
summary: Seleos is a fantasy visual novel for the NaNoRenO 2021 lineup — a jam where creators make a visual novel in a month — and Circle Pegasi's fourth NaNoRenO project in total. As usual, we hope you enjoy it and please let us know what you thought of it!

name: Sentimental Garden
summary:
Is this space I see now a phantom garden?
Is this space I see now a phantom garden?

This is a short game in which you simply walk around in a garden-like space.

name: Seed of Nostalgia
summary: Seed of Nostalgia is a beautiful pixel art JRPG which follows the tale of Atilla and a cast of intriguing characters on a quest to save their dying world. Explore a mystical land, unravel dark secrets, and confront ancient forces in a tale of magic, sacrifice, and unexpected revelations.

name: Senran Kagura Run
summary: An auto-runner game released for the 7th anniversary of Senran Kagura: New Link.

name: Sea of Thieves: 2024 Edition
summary: Sea of Thieves is a smash-hit pirate adventure game, offering the quintessential pirate experience of plundering lost treasures, fighting intense battles, vanquishing sea monsters and more. Dive in with this revised edition of the game, which includes access to digital bonus media.

name: Sea of Dreams Survivors
summary:
Welcome aboard the Sea of Dreams, can you survive to this nightmare ?

Fend against vast enemy forces, with hundreds of nightmarish foes swarming the screen at any given time.

In this action-packed rogue-lite, you play as one of the survivors trapped aboard the Sea of Dreams.

Slay, adapt, and grow stronger with every wave of enemies—then slay even more!

Upgrade your abilities, and unlock unique perks to adapt to the escalating chaos.

Set in the terrifying universe of Sea of Dreams, this standalone spin-off delivers relentless action in a world steeped in dread and mystery. Will you endure the horrors of The Other World and find your way back, or will you become another lost soul aboard the Sea of Dreams?

The nightmare begins. Will you survive?

name: Serious Sam Forever
summary: Serious Sam Forever is a modification of serious sam 2 that was intended to be a remake on the first encounters but had been canceled after the release of HD but returned years later

name: Seven Kingdoms: The Princess Problem
summary:
Every seven years the seven kingdoms send their best and brightest young people to be their delegates at the Vail Isle Summit, a tradition where seven weeks are spent together to form friendships, alliances and marriages. This year, however, things are different. Since the Great Peace, never have alliances been so close to collapse. The seven nations on the razor's edge of war. What happens at this summit could very well determine the fate of the known world.

You are one of the delegates.

name: Sea Balloon
summary: Explore a variety of islands with a red balloon! An ode to the art of taking it slow.

name: Serious Lord of the Rings Bros
Sealand Survivor
summary: Survive on Sealand, a mysterious WWII island defense base. Face extreme weather, solve puzzles, and fight off hostile forces trying to stop you. Can you uncover its secrets and escape before time runs out?

name: Serial Cleaner: Blood & Confetti
summary: The work of a good cleaner is never done! Bob is back, forced to track down The Fest-Evil killer across three crime-ridden celebrations - Chinese New Year, Día de los Muertos, and Mardi Gras. Sneak, sweep, and survive in this stylish 2D stealth-action DLC. Tread carefully… the dead are watching.

name: Separium: 12th Elevator
summary: You are the Administrator of Separium. Complete AI Purry's mission to assess anomalies in the elevator and reach the Administrator's Office on the 12th floor.

name: Seaside Fireflies
summary: A seagull meets a girl on the beach who's having a heck of a time gathering fireflies along the seashore. Undeterred, our hero offers to help her collect every firefly on the beach!

name: Sea of Thieves: X Edition
summary: Dive into Sea of Thieves with this special edition of the smash-hit pirate adventure, which includes the base version of the game along with a comprehensive collection of ship sets inspired by Xbox and beloved Xbox titles, plus a varied assortment of cosmetics, currency and access to digital bonus media.

name: Sea of Thieves: 2025 Premium Edition
summary: Dive into Sea of Thieves with this special edition, which includes all additional content from the 2025 Deluxe Edition and also adds a Premium Bundle containing the Dire Dark Warsmith Ship Collection, Costume Set and Ship's Crest, as well as 1000 Ancient Coins for use in the Pirate Emporium.

name: Seaport Man
summary: A short horror game where the protagonist, having escaped from a sunken ship, wanders the sea.

name: Selene
summary: On a starry night, a shooting star knocks the moon out of the sky... What will the little moon do now?

name: Secrets for Taking
summary: Take the others' deepest secrets--including your own. Find out where you belong in this decaying world.

name: Sea Scraps
summary: After a catastrophic event flooded the Earth, the remnants of humanity are left adrift on an endless ocean. With nothing but scraps of the old world floating across the waves, survivors must scavenge, build, and fight to stay alive in this vast water-covered wasteland.

name: Seeds
summary: Plant seeds, and reap valuable plants in this relaxing idle game. Collect rare varieties and build your virtual garden empire, then sell your bountiful harvest on the Steam Marketplace!

name: Seventh Choir
summary: Seventh Choir is a horror game about a hunter who is sent to kill an elk deep within a snow covered swamp. Look to those in the heavens and believe the cry of the seventh choir. A short atmospheric horror game inspired by PS2 hunting games and the Book of Revelation.

name: Second Chances
summary: A turn-based RPG where every battle is a puzzle, and every choice carries weight. Guide Paul Kimbel, a troubled author trapped between life and death, through a haunting world built from his own imagination. No grinding—just pure strategy, exploration, and high-stakes combat.

name: Secrets of Worlds: Mystery Agency - Collector's Edition
Seed's End
summary: Seed's End is an open world farming and adventure game. Play alone or with others as you expand your farm, discover new technology, and explore the land and sea.

name: Sengoku Koihime X: Otome Kenran Sengoku Emaki Koujou-ke Souran-hen
summary:
Kensuke trained hard every day under the tutelage of his uncle Kazuto. One day, when he held a sword he found in the storehouse, he lost consciousness. When he came to, he found himself in a place he did not recognize. He met a girl who introduced herself as Oda Saburou Kuon Nobunaga. She held out her hand to a stunned Kensuke and asked him to become her husband and accompany her on the road to national supremacy.

They travelled across the country, racking up victories in this period of social upheaval. However, there was one enemy they could not defeat: the oni. These man-eating, blood-drinking beasts soon took over all of Japan, plunging the country into hell. However, Kuon and Kensuke vowed to continue fighting, issuing a written appeal to all the influential lords: “Samurai who are not afraid of even the oni, gather under me and let us save Japan together!”

name: Sengoku Koihime + Sengoku Koihime X Set
summary:
Kensuke trained hard every day under the tutelage of his uncle Kazuto. One day, when he held a sword he found in the storehouse, he lost consciousness. When he came to, he found himself in a place he did not recognize. He met a girl who introduced herself as Oda Saburou Kuon Nobunaga. She held out her hand to a stunned Kensuke and asked him to become her husband and accompany her on the road to national supremacy.

They traveled across the country, racking up victories in this period of social upheaval. However, there was one enemy they could not defeat: the oni.
