However, Kuon and Kensuke vowed to continue fighting, issuing a written appeal to all the influential lords: “Samurai who are not afraid of even the oni, gather under me and let us save Japan together!”

name: Sesame Street Fighter
summary: A Sesame Street inspired "fighting" game where you defeat your opponents by typing quickly.

name: Setsuna ni Kakeru Koi Hanabi
summary:
In the 2040s in Japan, the near-future sport "Jindou" boasts a high popularity as the sport of the people. And the the most famous of all the Jindou performances is the "Daihouen".

Suzakuin Nadeshiko, although currently still a school student, has been fantastically making a name for herself as a pro swordswoman. On the other side, the protagonist Takizawa Kazuma, a washed-up pro swordsman, competes in underground Jindou matches to make ends meet.

One day, these two who were born and lived in completely different worlds had a fateful meeting.

"Kazuma-san, your swordsmanship is the real deal. Fight with us in the Daihouen and let's make it to the top!"

"...yeah. If we could that'd be great"

The pair, captivated by Jindou, are drawn to each other's swordsmanship and seek each other. With Takizawa Komari and Hanabusa Palvi joining Team White Wolf too, they eventually make big waves on the stage of the Daihouen.

If they win, glory awaits. If they lose, they fall from grace. With their beliefs held in their breasts, the swordsmen step out into a battle they can't afford to lose in the intense world of pros.

Swordsmen live in the moment. The "moment" you let slip will never come back-- in which case, set your soul alight.

name: Secret Story
summary: Secret Story is a single-player life‑simulation game that adapts the format of the French reality TV show of the same name. Players assume the role of one of 12 housemates, each assigned a secret, and compete over an eight‑week in‑game period.

name: Sea Walker Saga
summary: An exciting steampunk adventure with strategy and RPG elements. Fight pirates, explore the seabed, build your own battle island and set out into the vast world ocean in search of a mythical continent!

name: Season Island
summary: Season Island is an interactive role-playing experience in which you guide Spike, a human stranded in a mystical seasonal globe…

name: Seyahat: A Journey to Mecca
summary: Seyahat: A Journey to Mecca is a unique free-to-play 2D RPG which is designed as an educational tool to help players and students to engage with the cultural history of the seventeenth-century Ottoman Empire and Islamic world.

name: S.E.X. Z.O.N.E.
summary: Welcome to S.E.X. Z.O.N.E. ☢️, where the perilous lands near Chernobyl await! Protect a group of hot girls in your bunker, explore the irradiated Zone, gather rare artifacts, and unlock unforgettable rewards in our new adult game!

summary: SEXXX GIRLS [18+] is a futuristic visual novel with point-and-click gameplay. Step in as a PR agent for top superheroines, managing scandals, boosting reputations, and navigating a world of lies, temptation, and power. Will you follow the system or break it? Your choices shape everything!

name: Sexuality with Girlfriends: Kello & Cammy
summary: The gameplay is simple and easy to understand but full of challenges, and you need to connect three or more identical elements together by scratching the pattern to eliminate them! Complete the specified goals within a limited number of steps to unlock new levels.

summary: Sex Summer Camp is a visual novel where you have to go to a summer camp to meet girls and get lots of sex.

name: Sex Sport College
summary: Welcome to our fresh adult visual novel! Hot college girls playing basketball, and you’re coaching them - could you ask for more? Meet the team, get to know their deepest secrets, help them win and bring the prize home in Sex Sport College !

summary: Set out on a journey across America in SEX Route 69 - an adult visual novel finding the perfect balance between romance, adventure, and a road-movie. summary: Welcome to SEX Police, where you're the city's last line of defense! Take down the city's most dangerous women, choose between justice and vice, and uncover the secrets hidden behind every interrogation. Will you clean up the streets or get entangled in the crime underworld?

Can you balance your work duties while exploring the personal lives of your colleagues and trying to solve the mystery of a new virus?

name: Sex Formula
summary: This game narrates how the player meets Reika and begins a life together. Before satisfying Reika sexually, she will not agree to date you, even if you already have a physical relationship.

name: Sex Exit
summary: SEX EXIT – You’re trapped in a mysterious, looping street with no way out. Spot anomalies to escape or get stuck forever. Tempting girls and porn screens will distract you, but terror lurks beneath. Lust vs. fear—can you break the cycle, or will desire consume you?

name: Sex Clinic 18+
summary: Sex Clinic 18+ is an adult game where you play as a detective infiltrating a luxurious clinic with dark secrets. Investigate, give in to temptations, and unravel intrigues while danger lurks nearby!

name: Sex, Camera, Action!
summary: Sex, Camera, Action! invites you to an exciting journey into the world of the film industry and sexual adventures in an unusual place - an elite country mansion, where an adult film studio is being set up.

name: Sex Apartment
summary: You have a rare gift—the ability to communicate with your INNER SELF. Now, it's your turn to manage a cozy house full of charming ladies while your father recovers. Can you keep things running smoothly, win hearts, and uncover the house's secrets? Success or failure—it’s up to you!

name: Sex Amnesia: Lover Sim
summary: Your girlfriend has lost her memory and now is clueless about who you are. Isn’t it the perfect opportunity to relive all the best memories and create them once again? Explore each other in a mix of a dating sim, a life sim and a visual novel that is SEX Amnesia !

name: Sewing Stuff
summary: Sewing Stuff is a delightful and immersive game that invites you to explore your creativity and precision with every stitch.

name: Sewers Adventures
summary: Dive into Sewers where you will find a secret lab filled with terrifying creatures. Face the horrors of a fallen scientist and try to escape his dark legacy. This project was conceived in the context of a Level Design programming course.

name: Senet: Households
summary: Prove you're blessed by the gods in this Online Multiplayer Ancient Egyptian Board Game.

name: Sellsword Saga
summary: Sellsword Sage is a nonlinear turn-based RPG about building your mercenary company. Gather experienced fighters, mages, and everything in between as you travel the world and experience unique storylines containing their own goals and motives.

name: Secret Toy
summary: The main character who spent his days just playing and eating! One day, a special order came from his father, and he became the president of an adult product development company! Let’s target their tastes and check out their fantasies together!

name: Secret Hot Springs Girl
summary: Relax and release all stress in this isometric pixel-art game, blessed by the goddess of hot springs. Bathe together with the beautiful Sayaka, travel to various locations and enjoy a wholesome time with the Secret Hot Springs Girl.

name: Secret Horny Santa
summary: SECRET HORNY SANTA is a visual novel for adults where you will realize the dreams of sexy girls.

name: Secrets of Salem: Shadow of the Witch - Collector's Edition
summary: A hidden object puzzle adventure. Uncover Salem's dark secrets as Dakota battles shadows and her fate.

name: Sejm The Game
summary: Become a member of the Polish parliament, create a powerful party and lead it to victory - get a taste of power and don't let anyone take it away from you!

name: Sentience
summary: Sentience is a game following a little girl who is trapped in her bedroom. She wants to get out. Will you help her?

name: Secrets of Paradise: Merge
summary:
“Secrets of Paradise” is a new mobile game in merge genre with elements of simulation and family-friendly storytelling, where players complete orders, cook delicious meals, and renovate a beautiful island estate. Dive into a complex metagame that blends Merge-2 mechanics, creative design, and strategic tasks to restore paradise piece by piece.

Join Ellie as she returns to her childhood island to restore what was lost and uncover long-buried secrets.

name: Serenitrove
summary: A pixel art digging game where the goal is to dig deeper and uncover more as you progress. Enjoy a relaxed, timer-free experience with no enemies, just pure exploration. Customize your setup, take your time, and excavate as much treasure as you can.

name: Set a Watch: Digital Edition
summary: Assemble your party to survive in this dice-management game! Master steel and magic: roll dice and next use them to attack directly or for powerful abilities. Scout, light a fire, use ancient runes or equip perks to prepare before battle. Use tactics to fight monsters and Unhallowed. Set a watch!

name: Seasonala Cemetery
summary: A meditative experience that invites players to explore the serene beauty of a living, breathing cemetery as it changes with the seasons.

name: Sem Saída
summary:
The story takes place in Nova Esperança, fictional city of São Paulo (Brazil).
You are in control of a regular adult man called Marcos Leme, a simple helper in mail delivery, he is divorced and have a son to take care.
One night at 11PM (already passed his service hours), Marcos is still wandering the city with his arrogant working "partner", with only a mysterious letter addressed to a building that you've never heard about, arriving there, your partner leaves you all alone to make the delivery.
The plot takes place there, in that big building that you had no idea it existed, what is this place? It's really morbid, I don't feel good here, a great discomfort takes over my soul... I want to go home...

name: Seamongrel
summary: Welcome to Sea Ecosystem Adventure (SEA) park. Explore the park, and have a gander at the breathtaking exhibits the aquarium holds! Watch sharks swim about in the tunnel tank, be mesmerized by the glowing jellyfish, and admire the iconic SEA Park dolphin statue! The park is for you to (die) have your own adventure!

name: Secret Challenge
summary: Secret Challenge is a multiplayer party game for 2 to 8 players where each participant receives a secret task to complete without being detected. Challenges include actions such as making another player say a specific word, pretending to sneeze, hiding an object, or encouraging someone to sing. Players aim to complete their tasks while remaining inconspicuous, as others try to identify who has a challenge. The game is played in person using a mobile device and includes optional challenge packs that introduce different themes and scenarios for varied gameplay.

name: SeedHero
summary: Experience a rhythm game where every beat brings your seed to life! Grow and evolve your seed in sync with the music, mastering challenging mechanics and stunning visuals.

name: Severed Love
summary: You have lost both your legs and arms and you can’t remember anything... The Limb-Severing Devil's Confinement and Devotion. Your only way to survive...

name: Sesame Street Mecha Builders
summary: Embark on exciting adventures with Mecha Elmo, Cookie Monster, and Abby Cadabby! Explore science, engineering, creativity, and math through engaging games and activities designed for kids aged 2-6. Endless fun and learning await!

name: Self Simulated
summary: Self Simulated is a fast-paced precision platformer for the Game Boy Color. Play as a robotic version of yourself and navigate over 100 handcrafted levels filled with enemies, hazards, and glitch-filled dangers. Uncover your past and master tight, responsive controls designed for fast retries and fluid movement.

name: Sea Blindness
summary: Sea Blindness is a 2D pixel-art narrative RPG Game. In the year 2064, players assume the role of Jimmy, a deep-sea researcher who becomes entangled in a mysterious incident only to discover he's trapped inside a video game.

name: Sect House
summary: Indie Horror in which you play as a child whose once-happy life is shattered after your how your parents gave you to a cult by a pastor. Trapped in a nightmarish home, you must explore environments, solve eerie puzzles, and without falling into the hands of the pastor. Can you escape the house?

name: Seraphonin
summary: A dark fantasy precision platformer set in a broken world ravaged by hunger and immortality.

name: Sea of Remnants
summary: Sea of Remnants is an original ocean adventure RPG developed by Joker Studio. Your journey begins as a puppetfolk sailor who has lost their memory. Alongside a mysterious girl, you’ll set sail on a chaotic and colorful voyage—one filled with treasure, conflict, dreams, and unexpected companions. As the seas stretch endlessly before you, an epic world of myth and history slowly unfolds. But beware, Captain: fall overboard, and your mind may be swallowed by the very thing this ocean was named for—forgetting.

name: Seeking the Guardian
summary: 「Seeking The Guardian」is a puzzle adventure game filled with puzzles and “impossible” puzzles. Within the stone cave engraved with legends of the Guardian, read the murals, solve the puzzles, and search for the exit.

name: Seaquest Find the Difference
summary: Dive into the underwater world and find all the differences!Embark on an amazing adventure in the depths of the ocean! In this exciting game, 80 levels await you with images of marine animals—from graceful dolphins to formidable sharks, colorful fish, and other sea creatures.

name: Seventh
summary: Seventh is a fast-paced, speedrun-focused FPS with parkour elements, themed around the seven deadly sins.

name: Secrets of Blackrock Manor: Escape Room
summary: Find the hidden fortune of Blackrock Manor. Discover the truth about the family deaths. In this mysterious Escape room, you will have to solve puzzles to find the hidden vault with the treasure. But you will find much more...

name: Serial Dreams Escape
summary: A short walking simulator about dreams.

name: Sera Dion: Survivor
summary: Play Sera Dion: Survivor, a hack-and-slash roguelike game. Fight for survival by slaying thousands of monsters, creating your own skill combinations, and facing powerful bosses. Play alone or with friends and challenge yourself for a thrilling experience.

name: Sepulcrum
summary: A turn based tactics roguelite! Gather a powerful band and defeat the evil that lies within The Sepulcrum...

name: Sekira
summary: Dark forces are penetrating our world! Help the humble priestess Anachel crush the heads of the Dark Lord and all his minions!

name: Secret Pie
summary: Secret story between the mansion manager and three women

name: Sega Football Club Champions
summary:
SEGA Football Club Champions is the latest multiplatform football management simulator from SEGA! Play for free!
Start off with a small club competing locally, and aim to take on the world

name: Seven Sinners
summary: Seven Sinners is a western roguelike with turn-based QTE combat. Guide a band of outlaws from the Wild West. Recruit new sinners into your gang, rob stagecoaches and banks, roam the prairies, and evade the sheriff and his hounds. Will you get rich or will you disappear in the prairies?

name: Sea Drillers
summary: An isometric Tycoon, where you can control any Worker in First Person. Build an Oil Rig and extract Oil for endless profits. Beware of Greedy Pirates!

name: Service Please
summary: Service Please is an engaging restaurant management simulation. Welcome your customers, manage your staff, expand your menu, and oversee the flow behind the kitchen. In this journey from a small eatery to a prestigious restaurant, every decision matters.

name: Secret Seeker
summary: Explore forgotten dimensions, find forbidden objects, and reveal hidden secrets. Beware - time is your enemy, and something is watching you. A mix of roguelite, horror, stealth, pressure, and secrets best left alone.

name: Sekai Saikyou Ginsei Igo 3
summary: Sekai Saikyou Ginsei Igo 3 is a board game that offers authentic igo (weiqi) experience. Apart from matching with the computer, 2 player matching is also supported. Player can pick from three types of board: 9x9, 13x13 and 19x19, and set the game as even or with up to nine handicap stones. Jump into the world of igo today!

name: Section Six Requiem
summary: You are assigned by the organization to hunt down the escaped test subjects. Every action unfolds through turn-based card battles— persuasion or reconciliation, conflict or closure, the power of choice is in your hands!

name: Sea of Tranquility
summary: Escape your doomed mission from the Moon. Explore a vast open-world landscape and evade its dangers. Land shuttles, solve puzzles, control cameras, hack systems, uncover mysteries, and roam tranquil plains in your Rover. Survive the mission. Make your escape.

name: Seoul Exorcist 1111
summary: Think Fast, Strike Faster! As the ultimate exorcist, choose your attacks wisely, upgrade combat deck, combine traits and items, and save the cursed souls—before death finds you.

name: Seedovia
summary: Seedovia is a rogue-like dungeon crawler where you traverse room after room, fighting challenging monsters. Chain your weapons, collect game-changing passive upgrades, and equip items to create unique builds and become increasingly more powerful.

name: Sery: Into the World of Myths
summary: Dive into the mythical dream world of Sery for an epic adventure. In this precision 2D platformer, Sery must restore balance between the real world and the dream world, battling malevolent figures that invade her dreams.

name: Sense Cook
summary: Have you ever cooked like this? Try to rule the kitchen with three characters who can't see, hear or speak! Sense Cook is a chaotic and fun cooking game for co-op play with friends. With teamwork, manage the chaos and prepare delicious meals!

name: Sea of Fire
summary: Pick a side, build units, conquer land. Can you control all of the Worlds resources?

name: Sea of Thieves: Smuggler's Tide - Season 17
summary: Order of Bone and Blade Skeletons have been hard at work in the Skeleton Forts, installing traps and hoarding weaponry – and now they’re under assault by the Dark Brethren’s Phantom fleet! Carve your way through this mêlée, unlock the Weapons Cache by defeating a Master of Arms whose skull serves as the key, then slay your way through the remaining threats to stake your claim to the Vault…

name: Sea of Souls
summary: Discover the secrets of the cycle of reincarnation in Sea of Souls! A Turn-Based RPG with various Metroidvania elements to help you explore the world.

name: Seen Before
summary: Seen Before is a psychological horror game where you are trapped in a looping environment, trying to detect inconsistencies and escape the cycle.

name: Serious Survivors
summary: Serious Survivors is a roguelike first-person shooter that blends retro-style combat with modern progression mechanics. Players face waves of enemies while collecting perks and unlockables across procedurally generated levels. The game features permadeath mechanics where each run provides opportunities to discover new combinations of weapons and abilities, incorporating classic shooter gameplay with persistent progression elements.

name: Secret Paws: Cozy Offices
summary: Secret Paws - Cozy Offices is a game where you need to find all the hidden cats in the offices. Open furniture, move objects, and uncover all the hiding spots. Are you ready to become the master at finding cats?

name: Serk: Chaos City Delivery
summary: Are you from a city with no traffic? Do you feel that pain? Yes? I built this game for you — it simulates how a chaotic city with no traffic rules makes people suffer. No? Then it’s your time to find out what the other side of the world feels like!

name: Seedborne Soldiers
summary: An auto battler roguelike made by obsessive fans of both genres. Draft fighters with matching Traits to power up your team. A massive content pool enables a large variety of builds. Weigh risk vs. reward every round as you carve a path toward each boss.

name: Sexy Glasses
summary: Sexy Glasses is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: Sex Dorm
summary: Sex Dorm – A visual novel where you play as a student from Japan who moves to the U.S. to experience college life. Explore new cultures, build relationships, work part-time, and dive into your hidden desires in the world of university life.

name: Servant of the Lake
summary: Servant of the Lake is the new premium point-and-click adventure in the Rusty Lake series from the creators of the Cube Escape series, The Past Within and Underground Blossom.

name: Serial Experiments L-If-e
summary: This is a derivative work of the 1990s anime game [Serial Experiments Lain]. It was created using RPG Maker MZ and based on the official guidelines "Lain Time to Live".The game is about exploring dungeons and reading the scenario.

name: Setup Savior
summary: Set out on a creative journey, organize, decorate, and level up clients setups as you chase your dreams and build your business as the “Setup Savior”. Tidy up and refurnish rooms, decorate surroundings, and sell old furniture to purchase new, unleash your creativity and achieve your vision!

name: Sector Force
summary: One pilot, thirty stranded workers, hundreds of asteroids heading their way.

name: Session: Skate Sim - Paris
summary: Hop on your deck and cruise to Paris to check out the local skate scene! Shred in front of the Eiffel Tower and hit up Place du Trocadéro, Place de la République, and the spot by Mairie d'Ivry town hall to give your tricks some French flair.

name: Session: Skate Sim - Prague
summary: Roll into Prague and hit up the city's most insane square, where locals have transformed a former mythical monument into a world-class skate mecca.

name: Sealubbers
summary: Set sail in Sealubbers, a pirate RPG. Command your pirate ship, recruit a crew, battle and board enemy vessels, and hunt for buried treasure. Embark on quests, meet intriguing characters, and forge your legend as the most famous pirate on the high seas.

name: Secret Neighbor + Hello Engineer The Neighborhood Bundle
summary:
Secret Neighbor is an ever-growing multiplayer Social Horror game set in the Hello Neighbor universe. Your group has one goal - sneak around the house, collecting the keys in order to unlock the basement door. The only problem is - one of you is the Neighbor, a traitor in disguise!

Hello Engineer is a single and multi-player machinery-construction game set in a puzzling amusement park. Build incredible machines with scrap parts, challenge the creepy Neighbor and his evil bots, and overcome challenges with your creative problem-solving skills. Join up to three friends and roll, fly or bounce your way to victory.

name: Seven Hearts
summary: Seven Hearts is a vibrant strategy RPG where you assemble a team from over 300 unique heroes across seven classes. The game features real-time tactical combat, powerful tanks with special abilities, and deep team-building mechanics. Engage in various modes, including PvP arenas and guild raids.

name: Seas of Raesenia
summary: Explore a naval fantasy world in an ancient battleship. Defeat anyone who wants to take your ship, and raise a valiant crew. Solve the mystery of the Veil in a multi-hour story-based campaign!

name: Self-Comb Women: Home Left Behind
summary: Self-Comb Women: Home Left Behind is a first-person walking simulator where players step into traditional Cantonese architecture and experience the unique cultural heritage of the Pearl River Delta through immersive visuals and storytelling. @Old Media Art x Pu Xiaoyue

name: Selling Game
summary: Draw your product, name it, and create a slogan — then compete with others and turn doodles into dollars!

name: Sef Saga
summary: Shape your unique adventure in Sef Saga, a roleplaying sandbox, every game is different! Master 14 skills, talk to anyone, and forge your path. Explore above ground, delve to Magamada, or hunt for treasure in desert Labyrinths. Be a combatant, a farmer, or a trader and more - your destiny awaits.

name: Seven Days Until Morning
summary: Seven Days Until Morning is an atmospheric horror game that leaves you isolated on the dwarf planet of Pluto. You play as an survivor of the collapse of humanity. Escape the end and survive to see the morning.

name: Seasons of Chiba
summary: Players roleplay as a resident returning to their hometown, making choices at various stages of the town's development to influence its future and story outcomes. Return to your childhood town and continue life's journey.

name: SeaCret 1
summary: Sail into the 17th-century Caribbean in SeaCret 1, a riotous mix of strategy, humor, and adventure! Trade, fight, or govern your way to fame in this sandbox escapade, where every choice brings riches or ridiculousness.

name: Serpent at the Vernissage
summary: An open-world adventure set in an abandoned island paradise, where nothing is quite what it seems. Explore forgotten villas, sentient art pieces and sunken opera houses. And find your way back home before the archipelago swallows you whole.

name: Seven Squad
summary: Roguelike... but this time, with a squad of heroes. In 7 Squad, you’re not the lone hero anymore. You begin with one cheerful champion and gradually assemble a squad of up to seven charming, weird, and wildly different heroes—each with unique powers and personality.

name: Serpico
summary: Serpico is a first-person hack and slash fantasy game set on a mysterious island filled with ancient ruins, divine powers, and lurking darkness.

name: Sea of Thieves: Wild Things - Season 15
summary: Sea of Things: Wild Things update brings new megalodons, new and more ambient wildlife, throw-able spears, wild boars, new fishing voyages, Hunter's Call emissary flags, and a raise of their reputation cap to match the other factions

name: Sea of Thieves: Reaper's Rule - Season 16
summary: Sea of Thieves: Reaper's Rule update brings two new voyages for the Reaper's Bones, emergent skeleton mercenaries to can dig up to help on an island, and the Cannon of Rage portable weapon.

name: Serra de Deus
summary: High up in a Rio de Janeiro favela, a young man lives a quiet life running a hot dog stand. But his routine takes a dark turn when a series of murders—linked to a mysterious cult—begins to shake the community.

name: Seconds Till Destruction
summary: Seconds Till Destruction is a lightning-fast, randomized top-down shooter played in six-second bursts. Warp onto different floors, kill them all, then do it again! Pick up and play for instant action, or try to clear as many floors as you can!

name: Secrets of Salem: The Phantom Cab - Collector's Edition
summary: A ghostly taxi prowls the streets of Salem. Step into a noir mystery where legends kill and ghosts remember. Solve puzzles, uncover secrets, and don’t look back—he’s right behind you.

name: Seal of Magic
summary: A turn-based auto-battler roguelike where you strengthen Spirits by sticking and stacking Seals. Since enemies build their power the same way, their abilities evolve with every encounter. No story—just pure focus on deep build-crafting.

name: Sensations
summary: Sensations gamifies the most popular ASMR trends into an experience that our users describe as: Meditative. Brain tingles. Oddly satisfying. Relaxation. Anxiety reducing...

name: Seiken Densetsu: The Emergence of Excalibur
Seashell Isle
summary: The island is waiting. What will you discover?

name: Service With a Shotgun
summary: Service With a Shotgun [SWAS] is a mash up of visual novel storytelling and chaotic wave game shooting. You're the last poor soul manning a beat-up roadside shop in the middle of the zombie apocalypse. Shoot straight. Talk fast. Surely nothing can go wrong. Right?

name: Sediment
summary: Dig your way down through a deconstructible environment. Uncover the violence which founds and sustains capitalist modernity.

name: Second Coat
summary: Second Coat is a fast-paced multiplayer paintball game where players compete against each other by using strategy and skill to outmaneuver opponents, rack up eliminations, and achieve victory.

name: Session: Skate Sim Waterpark & Chris Cole
summary: Explore a brand-new map with the latest spots and missions. Your new playground is an old abandoned water park.

name: Sekai de Ichiban Kanashii Egao
summary: The protagonist, Gaku Serizawa, is a pachinko addict who goes to a pachinko parlor every day. One day, he happens to stop by a park on his way home from pachinko and meets a mysterious girl who wants sweets. His world starts to change little by little as he comes to know her.

name: Sea of Secrets
summary: Your family has been poor for generations, and now you have grown into manhood with one goal: free them from poverty and struggle. A loot-based RPG with over 150 items to use and equip, over 20 skills to use and many quests to complete.

name: Seasons of Solitude
summary: Seasons of Solitude is a turn-based survival strategy game where every move drains limited resources, and every decision must serve a larger plan. Each handcrafted level is a tactical puzzle of movement, action timing, and resource management within a world that changes over time.

name: Sense: The Game
summary: "Sense The Game" is a unique philosophical game inspired by the myth of Sisyphus, where you are tasked not just with pushing a boulder, but also with seeking answers to life's most profound questions.

name: Senkou
summary: You must not extinguish any of the incense sticks. This is the only rule in this game. You can continue playing for longer by controlling the wind direction and timing when to add new incense sticks. When all the incense sticks are extinguished, the game ends.

name: Seirei no Mori no Bouken
summary: A short 3D action RPG where a girl escapes into a mysterious forest filled with cursed creatures. Fight, explore, and uncover a quiet story of healing—all in about 30 minutes.

name: Sealing Tower
summary: This is a deck-building roguelike game with rich Chinese cultural elements. The player takes on the role of a Taoist who accidentally enters the Sealing Tower and becomes trapped. By defeating monsters, you earn random cards and build a powerful deck to overcome all enemies and escape.

name: Self Destruct
summary:
Self Destruct is a hectic top-down arcade shooter made for the TIGSource PG competition. Players control a small ship that needs to survive 250 waves of enemies. The hook for this game is that all enemy waves are procedurally generated, making each gameplay sessions different.

The small ship is able to shoot, use a shield (limited amount) and launch a nuke that clears the entire screen. Defeated enemies leave behind four types of bonuses: blue (restores the shield), red (upgrades the weapons), yellow (restores the nuke) and green (maxes out everything). Despite using an offline executable, the game originally could only be played when connected to the internet to use the online highscore tables. Later, an offline version was released as well.

name: Seance
summary: A murder case has gone cold, and the NRPD has asked you to help them solve it, on account of your abilities as a psychic medium. Channel the dead, confront them with the truth, help them to unlock their memories, and solve the murder.

name: Seeking for Puppies
summary: Variant of Fancy Match included in Lexibook's Paw Patrol Portable Game Console.

name: Seed 2313
summary: Seed 2313 blends top-down bullet-hell shooting with tower defense. You'll explore an infinite, randomized future world, travel between cities, build structures with various functions, and battle fiercely in ever-changing levels.

name: Serious Sam 4: Reborn
summary: Serious sam 4 but if are Goofy and Less serious on his story.

name: Sea of Radiation 2
summary: Welcome to the perilous nuclear-contaminated waters, where all creatures are mutating. Start as an ordinary small fish, struggling to survive in this toxic sea. Through continuous evolution and adaptation, you will grow into a powerful ocean monster and ultimately become the sole ruler of this ocean

name: Serpent
summary: SERPENT - Snake × Block Puzzle Cooperative Game

name: Session: Skate Sim - Supporter Pack
summary: The team has kept some surprises for the release: experience Péitruss, the largest skatepark in Europe; the Hangar, a new training area; and a load of cool gear – a prisoner outfit, two exclusive grip tapes and two decks!

name: Sector 404
summary: Sector 404 is a first-person anomaly horror game set in a crumbling Soviet housing block. After taking your medicine, your world begins to fracture. Climb from floor to floor, uncovering distorted anomalies and your own unraveling mind. Miss too much, and reality resets. Will you ever make it home?

name: Sector Shooter
summary: Step into the chaos of Sector Shooter, a fast-paced action game where you’ll battle through a series of themed sectors, from dusty desert to deep industrial mines. Face a variety of enemies, collect coins and buffs, and push forward through increasingly challenging sectors. Each sector contains a set number of enemies that must be defeated before you can move on. As you progress, upgrade your character and weapons, sharpen your reflexes, and prepare for a challenging boss fight showdown.

name: Sequence Jump
summary: Sequence Jump is a unique sequence-platformer where everything is glitching—except your mind. With just a single button, you control abilities like jumping, dashing, and teleporting. Think ahead, react at the right moment, and conquer challenging levels full of logic, timing, and digital chaos.

name: Seaward
summary: Seaward is a cozy exploration game where you build a ship to discover a flooded world. Find resources and power your ship with renewable energies. Meet unique characters and help them out to build a wholesome community. Make the journey your own by taking photos and filling up your journal.

name: Sexy Erotic Xtreme Club
summary: Solve puzzles, uncover secrets, and admire every detail of stunning artwork!

name: Selanìa
summary: Meet a cast of eccentric characters, gain their trust, and help them rewrite their stories. And yours. Lose yourself in Selanìa, where the greenhouse blooms of curious plants, the kitchen is always hungry, and the library whispers tales. Or just sit down, and relax.

name: Seamspace: Minesweeper
summary: The classic Minesweeper experience launched into a 3D space environment. Strategically reveal cells against a backdrop of stars and nebulae to beat your best times. Play the traditional beginner, intermediate, and expert difficulties or take control and create your own board in the custom mode.

name: Sever the Wicked!
summary: A short, immediately replayable high score game where you try to defeat as many enemies as you can within a short period of time.

name: Secret Paws: Cozy Apartments
summary: Secret Paws - Cozy Apartments is a game where you need to find all the hidden cats in the apartments. Open furniture, move objects, and uncover all the hiding spots. Are you ready to become the ultimate cat finder?

name: Sea Hotel: Fish Scales
summary: Experience the laid‑back joy of fishing in **Sea Hotel: Fish Scales**! Run your very own floating houseboat, explore uniquely themed ocean zones, and fully customize both your vessel and your character. Climb aboard now and embark on a deep‑sea fishing adventure that's as stylish as it is relaxing!

name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice - Game of the Year Edition
summary:
Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice is an action-adventure game developed by FromSoftware, set in late 1500s Sengoku-era Japan. The player controls the “one-armed wolf,” a warrior who sets out to rescue his kidnapped lord and restore his honor after being left for dead. It combines stealth, exploration, and precise combat, featuring the use of prosthetic tools and ninja techniques. Players face powerful enemies and navigate a world shaped by constant conflict and mythic elements.

The Game of the Year Edition allows you to access the Game of the Year update content from the beginning.

name: Serre
summary: Serre is an escape game in a small open world, featuring inhabitants trapped inside a greenhouse and a time loop. You must escape from this eternal trap! Will you manage to break free from this cage before the dark night falls? Or will you relive the same day over and over again?

name: Sempai no Namida
summary: A game inspired by ULTRAKILL and Pizza Tower, with cutres sprites and a gameplay fast when do you need to explote mechanics like, slide, parries and combos to get the highest score ever! In this game, you are Shisiki, she can switch between a lot of waifus with differents weapons and combos! Your objective? DESTROY YOUR SEMPAI'S BRAIN.

name: Sex & Coffee
summary: Play as a charming barista, brew magical coffee, and build spicy connections with quirky customers like a bunny cop, a demon writer, and a wild elf. Save your coffee shop and uncover love, secrets, and temptation!

name: Seleri's Lament
summary: In the depths of the forest of Lovellia there is a girl, who calls herself a "witch", with a mission to deliver a mysterious letter to a detective "friend", but... it looks like it won't be as easy as she may have thought at first, one hardship after another will show up, thus she will have put forth her utmost effort to deliver the letter and complete her mission.

name: Second Works
summary: Second Works is a 2D platform action-adventure game set in a sci-fi fantasy world based on biotechnology. Enjoy the unique atmosphere created by colorful anime-style graphics and the thrilling experience of high-difficulty action.

summary: Something has awoken in The Devil’s Roar and its impact can be felt across the seas! The Dark Brethren and those in their employ have made use of their newly smuggled Black Powder Barrels, blasting through solid rock to expose what they’ve been searching for. But as a result, a formidable Ancient fighting force has been roused. Will you be able to succeed against the fabled Eternal Guard?

name: Sea Warden
summary: Sea Warden is a co-op survival game set on a living island carried across the endless ocean by a massive sea turtle named Ao. The sea, the wind, and the creatures beneath the waves are always changing, but Ao keeps moving forward, no matter what.

name: Seoul Bridge
summary: You are trapped on the Seoul Bridge. Whether you move toward the exit or return to the entrance, you remain trapped on the Seoul Bridge. Observe your surroundings carefully and find a way to escape.

name: Serendipalette
summary: Serendipalette is a relaxing tile placing game with the mood of watercolor painting. Build up your color palette to earn balloons using combinations of colors.

name: Sectoris Sky
summary: Sectoris Sky is constantly evolving. New content, features, and optimizations will be added regularly.

name: Seeing Double
summary: In this puzzle platformer, your screen is split down the middle. Control Pitter and Patter simultaneously as you jump, dash, and climb through two parallel realities in this atmospheric adventure on your quest to reunite them.

name: Senior Sunset
summary: 35 dead students, dozens of silenced parents, and one police coverup later you decide it's time to take matters into your own hands. You descend into the depths of your high school to figure out what really happened to your classmates.

name: Sesame Street: Elmo Says
summary: Listen closely to Elmo's instructions and get ready for an experience that will have everyone laughing and moving.

name: Senara: The Sacrament
summary: "SENARA: The Sacrament" is a first-person survival horror aboard a ship. Uncover the truth while escaping fanatics and unspeakable horrors. In a place where blind faith and salvation intertwine, you’ll be forced to make choices that go far beyond survival.

name: Sex Therapy
summary: Sex Therapy is a candid visual novel for adults. A routine consultation with a sex therapist turns into a story of forbidden passion and awakened desires, where professional boundaries collapse under the pressure of long-suppressed hunger.

name: Sea of Mirrors
summary: A spot-the-difference logic game set on a mysterious sea where reflections cannot be trusted. Use your magic wand to free little creatures from the water's curse!

name: Sea Sweeper
summary: Sea Sweeper is a relaxing incremental game where you clean the ocean with your ship. Collect garbage, manage fuel, earn money, and upgrade your ship to clean faster and sweep larger sea areas each run.

name: Septem: The Preparation
summary: This is a short psychological horror experience focused on atmosphere, implication, and environmental storytelling rather than explicit visuals. The story reveals itself through subtle details. Nothing is rushed. Nothing is shown directly. Everything is implied.

name: Seasonaut
summary: Explore a 2D world divided between the four seasons, help its inhabitants, and solve the problems of each region while discovering the story behind this universe.

name: Sex Shop Simulator: X-RAY Desire
summary: Run your own adult shop — sell vibrant sex toys and lure horny girls with your skill at pleasure. Use an X-Ray scanner to see through clothing and catch sneaky thieves. Keep the shop hot and enjoy a wild variety of girls.

name: SeverLink
summary: SeverLink is a retro stealth action, inspired by the console classics of the early 2000s like Splinter Cell, MGS2-3 and Hitman Contracts. With the art direction emulating the distinct look of the Playstation 2 library of games.

name: Sex Adventures: Swingers Resort
summary: An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of two couples having sex with each other at the pool of an Adult Only Resort.

name: Sexxnator: Adult Sandbox RPG
summary: SEXXXNATOR is an RPG in the open world with a unique combat system and the ability to communicate with any girl and have sex with them.

name: Sengoku A Live
summary: A 7-Lane rhythm game starring Sengoku Period warriors who have time traveled to modern day Tokyo and formed a male idol group.

name: Sexy Chicken Girl Kisses Rotten Rabbit Man
summary: Puzzle through different relationships with the hot girl sitting right in her bedroom. Solve puzzles, complete minigames, and unlock different emotion based endings. 10 Endings. One room. One pretty girl. And one you.

name: Ser BubbleHelm
summary: Ser BubbleHelm is a single-player physics driven combat game. Use your skills and weapons to eliminate your enemies and avoid deadly traps. Are you up for the challenges of the Arena?

name: Sewer Raiders
summary: Descend into the dark sewers in this co-op horror dungeon crawler. Fight off mutants, complete puzzles, and collect Golden Toilet Work together or go alone every run is unique.

name: Sewercide
summary: Trapped in a bunker connected to an old sewer, you must survive a few days before the creature lurking below finds you. Explore dark tunnels, gather key items, solve environmental puzzles, and uncover what happened underground before “it” finally devours you.

name: Sebi 16
summary: Sebi 16 packs sixteen curated singleplayer games into one charming collection: metroidvanias, puzzle games, platformers, a roguelike, and even a deck builder. Built with love in PICO-8!

name: Security 51
summary: You're a security officer deep within Area 51. Scan the staff, verify clearances, and decide who can enter the elevator and who absolutely mustn't leave. The deeper you go, the less certain you are that anyone standing before you is still human.

name: Send In The Vampires
summary: A gothic horror arcade beat em up in a throwback psx retro style. Supports up to 4 players in local coop. Includes a randomizer for replayability.

name: Senatus
summary: Strategic card battles in the heart of the Roman Senate. Debate, persuade, and rise through the ranks to become Consul of Rome. Influence is power — and power decides everything.

name: Seize the Cheese
summary: Harness the power of explosions to propel yourself skyward and claim the biggest cheese, the Moon. Seize the Cheese, because you can never have enough cheddar!

name: Seasonal Drifter
summary: Drift through stunning natural landscapes, tight mountain hairpins and different weather conditions. Choose the right tires, adapt to the road, and put your drift skills to the test!

name: Serendipity Morning Mist: Dawn, Tobacco, Your Scent
summary: Your girlfriend, Chisa Tsukiyama, suddenly decides to go study abroad. Every prolonged touch, every held breath, every slight burning sensation becomes silent proof that you still exist for each other, leaving marks in the room until the countdown ends.

name: Sealbreakers
summary: A top-down 3D roguelite brawler where a disgraced warrior fights immortal tyrants in a collapsing reality. Break the world back with nothing but fists.

name: Selling & Parking & Crash Simulator Bundle
summary: Dig deep. Park smart. Crash hard. Three simulators. One ultimate bundle.

name: Sevenfall
summary: A turn-based strategy RPG with deck-building, fortress construction, and intense battles against legendary factions. Explore dangerous domains, conquer ancient keys, and face Ulthar, the Dark Trinity, in a journey where every choice shapes your destiny.

name: Secrets of Solari
summary: Secrets of Solari is a sci-fi action-adventure set in the year 3333, where you awaken from cryo-sleep inside a forgotten government facility. Guided by an alien voice and driven by quantum forces, explore fractured worlds, uncover hidden truths, and survive a reality collapsing into Solari.

name: Seraphine's Skyward Journey
summary: This game is an adventure game where you explore a steampunk-inspired world with 2.5D hand-drawn graphics aboard an airship. Manage resources like coal, food, and water while operating your airship, defeat sky pirates, engage in trade, and handle cargo transport as you venture into uncharted skies.
